Jims life is turned upside down when he stumbles across a dead woman and a large sum of money. Co-writer/director John Barrs thriller, starring Tom Berenger, Kristen Hager and Paul Ben-Victor.

programme.title: Escape to the Chateau
programme.sub-title: Escape to the Chateau at Christmas 2018
programme.desc: At the end of a busy year at Chateau de la Motte-Husson, Dick and Angel throw a Christmas party for everyone who helped them in restoring the property to its current glory. The festive menu includes produce from their own walled garden, as well as homemade wines, and the couple also put up a Christmas tree which, as usual, is on a spectacular scale

programme.title: Chateau DIY
programme.desc: Local dignitaries are scheduled to unveil the art studio in the fairytale turret at Chateau de Bourneau, so owners Erin and JB desperately try to complete the renovations in time. In the Dordogne, Nick, Nicole and baby Noah have outgrown their basement gite, so work begins on the renovations of the main body of their chateau. In Normandy, Donna and Paul start installing the first of their 40 bespoke windows in their abandoned water mill. The question is, has Paul got his measurements right?

programme.title: The Great House Giveaway
programme.desc: Assistant accountant Danielle and architect Alessio transform a tiny period one-bedroom cottage in Castle Donington, Leicestershire, into a modern holiday let. With no kitchen and a very basic bathroom in the damp-ridden property, theres a lot to unearth, including a hidden vintage Victorian inglenook

programme.title: The Great House Giveaway
programme.desc: Glamour model Alaw and technical engineer Harri are paired up to transform a one-bed terrace in Aberoer, Wrexham, into a house that would attract a first-time buyer

programme.title: A Place in the Sun
programme.desc: Lian and Dave are searching for a holiday home in Spains Almería Province to enjoy with their 13-year-old son Dominic. Ben Hillman lines up five impressive properties for their £80,000 budget, but will any of them be the perfect place?

programme.title: A Place in the Sun
programme.desc: Retired couple Stephen and Janis Pigeon have a budget of £150,000 to move to the western Costa del Sol. Having sold their Buckinghamshire home, the pressure is on for Jasmine Harman to find them a suitable place in the Spanish region reasonably quickly

programme.title: Come Dine with Me
programme.desc: Travel manager and part-time comedian Rod hosts the first party from Sussex, serving up a comprehensive and complicated menu - but a surprising lack of jokes. His guests are cheese-mad charity manager Paula, sarcastic solicitor Hassan, eccentric jewellery entrepreneur Sarah and animal psychic Josie

programme.title: Come Dine with Me
programme.desc: Mystic and animal communicator Josie takes over the kitchen in Sussex, where her guests are shocked to discover her mystical knick-knacks, including Tarot cards and a broomstick

programme.title: Come Dine with Me
programme.desc: Its the turn of food hub charity director Paula to host, who takes inspiration for her menu from her job, by using ingredients that have passed their best before date

programme.title: Come Dine with Me
programme.desc: The fourth night in Sussex, finds vegan solicitor Hassan acting as host, incorporating his love of Asian food into his menu. With his first course of gyoza winning over ultra-critical guest Rod and the rest of the table, it looks like Hassan is on a winning streak. However, a huge error in spice judgement causes spice-phobe Paula to throw in the towel and even challenges the taste buds of heat-loving Sarah

programme.title: Come Dine with Me
programme.desc: Serving up the last meal of the week in Sussex is jewellery entrepreneur Sarah, who hopes to scoop the grand with an evening of simple and nutritious food. Its an entertaining night with the group auditioning for a home shopping channel, one diner revealing their bovine secret and a cosmetic confession leaving everyone gobsmacked. As the evening draws to a close, a dodgy dessert throws the soiree off-track and there are tears at the table when the gang members assess their week together

programme.title: Four in a Bed
programme.desc: The competition begins at BnB at 43 in Richmond, North Yorkshire, where Jenny and Johnny Hatch hope their guests will enjoy a home-from-home experience

programme.title: Four in a Bed
programme.desc: Dazzling decor and cleanliness concerns give guests opposing views of Sutton Park in Blackpool, before a breakfast buffet comes under scrutiny in the morning

programme.title: Four in a Bed
programme.desc: For the third visit this week, the group head to Edburton in West Sussex, and Tottington Manor, where owners Debra and Jamie Tombs claim to offer the Manor House experience

programme.title: Four in a Bed
programme.desc: The final stay is at Flynns Pub and Guesthouse in Hackney, east London, run by friends Serena and Kelly, who pride themselves on having clean and stylish rooms

programme.title: Four in a Bed
programme.desc: It is the final day and the BandB owners meet for the last time to settle some scores. Jenny and Johnny want to get to the bottom of the stain on Kelly and Serenas stay

programme.title: Grand Designs
programme.desc: Kevin McCloud meets widowed teacher Gretta, who is making a fresh start in rural Cambridgeshire with a Malaysian-inspired burnt wood and glass home being designed by her nephew Carlos and project managed by her brother-in-law Fernando - despite his lack of building experience. However, as site clearance begins, so does the Covid-19 pandemic - and family harmony is tested when an apple tree much loved by Fernando is condemned for removal by Gretta

programme.title: Our Farm Next Door: Amanda, Clive and Kids
programme.desc: Amanda Owen and her family continue the task of turning an abandoned farmhouse into a 21st-century home. Its summer in Swaledale and the renovation of Anty Johns is about to hit its one-year anniversary, with plenty of work still to do for Richard the builder and the Owen family. For the kids, the summer holidays mean picnics and playing in the stream, but dad Clive is laid low by a hip operation

programme.title: Our Tiny Islands
programme.desc: Exploring some of the UKs smaller islands, as well as the wildlife and communities that inhabit them. This edition takes a look at the Isle of Gigha, where Tony and Catriona have settled and set themselves up as oyster farmers. Plus, cameras follow French-born Marie, who works as a fire officer at the tiny airport on the Scottish island of Fair Isle

programme.title: 999: On the Front Line
programme.desc: A motorcyclist collides with a deer. Luckily for the patient, an orthopaedic surgeon stops to help. A woman driving to work is forced to pull over and call 999 after experiencing heart palpitations. A young man is constantly being sick and needs to go to hospital. A bike ride ends with a bruised bottom the likes of which the paramedics have never seen before, and after seven weeks with an infection an asthma patient is still struggling to breathe

programme.title: Emergency Helicopter Medics
programme.desc: The air ambulance crews race to help a teenage motorcyclist who has been hit by a car and catapulted into the air - suffering multiple fractures to his legs and arms. On holiday in Cumbria, a man collapses while working out and his stepdaughter performs CPR to try to keep him alive. A driver suffers a nasty leg wound after being hit from behind on the M40 - and to make matters worse, he is trapped in his lorry

programme.title: 24 Hours in AandE
programme.desc: Leon, 36, is airlifted to St Georges after being involved in a head-on collision with a car, while rugby player Graham, 37, is treated after clashing with another player, and has lost feeling in his arms and legs. Plus, four-year-old Elliott has come to AandE with his mum after getting a foreign object stuck up his nose

programme.title: 24 Hours in AandE
programme.desc: Zach, whos 25, is rushed to AandE after completely severing four fingers in a building site accident. Staff and plastic surgeons assess the damage and stem the bloody wound. Cameras also follow former teacher Ricky, whos 85. She has hurt her back after falling at home, and 10-year-old Daquon was hit by a motorbike when he was on his way to school. He has memory loss and a badly broken arm

programme.title: Food Unwrapped
programme.desc: A selection of the teams favourite investigations. Kate Quilton visits Haagen-Dazs to find out why some vanilla ice-creams are more expensive than others, while Helen Lawal heads to Tanzania to see the lengths vanilla farmers go to in the production of the natural flavouring. Matt Tebbutt travels to the Netherlands to explore the myth that Edam was once used as emergency cannon balls and Jimmy Doherty learns about an innovative solution to the problem of shellfish feeding on discarded plastic in the sea

programme.title: Escape to the Chateau
programme.sub-title: Escape to the Chateau at Christmas 2020
programme.desc: Dick, Angel, Dorothy and Arthur, as well as Angels parents Jenni and Steve, prepare to celebrate a family Christmas in France. With an old 19th-century chateau ledger found in the attic and classic cookbooks to hand, the Strawbridges take inspiration from Christmases past, discovering what food, festivities, gifts and games would have been like in bygone eras. Dick and Angels imagination goes into overdrive as they create a winter wonderland with an ice rink at its heart. Later, as the family settles down to dinner, so the sound of traditional hand bells rings out across the chateau and they wonder if their exploration of the past will create chateau traditions for the future

programme.title: Chateau DIY
programme.desc: Terry and Ashley rush to finish their first guest room as their inaugural guest is en route and Tim and Sharon have an unpleasant encounter while renovating a tower bathroom suite. Alison and Zion book their first wedding at Chateau de la Boutinere

programme.title: The Great House Giveaway
programme.desc: Handyman Ned and estate agent Josh are paired up to transform a tired three-bed terrace in Crosby, Merseyside, into the ideal first-time buyers house. Its in the right location - close to shops and amenities - but a wonky outside wall left it languishing on the market for a long time. Bought at auction at a bargain basement price, its all to go for as long as the market stays buoyant. Ned and Josh need all their know-how to bring the house up to scratch in six months. Presented by Simon OBrien

programme.title: The Great House Giveaway
programme.desc: Simon OBrien presents, as carpenter Gareth and electrician Dan are paired up and given six months to transform a four-bedroom detached stone cottage in the village of Pennant in Ceredigion. They get it cheap at auction, but theres a reason - the gable wall is about to fall down. Will a £50k renovation budget and their invaluable building skills be enough to transform the place into something fit for 21st-century living?

programme.title: A Place in the Sun
programme.desc: Vicky and Carl have always planned to move to Spain for their retirement, but now that their children are going to university theyve brought their plans forward deciding that now is the time to find the perfect holiday home on the southern Costa Blanca. With a budget of £70,000, Jean Johansson shows the couple some tempting options - are any of them good enough for them to put in an offer?

programme.title: A Place in the Sun
programme.desc: Danni Menzies searches for the dream holiday home in Florida for Annette and Ian from Devon. The couple, who met when they were both teaching in the Royal Navy, have recently retired, and with their family all grown up, theyre ready to enjoy extended breaks along the Gulf Coast, where they can pursue their love of the water. Danni shows them five properties for their budget of £270,000

programme.title: Come Dine with Me
programme.desc: Five strangers from in and around the Hampshire town of Basingstoke compete to host the best dinner party. Marketing manager and maths enthusiast Nicole is first up with a foodie journey that takes her guests from Lebanon back to the UK via the Caribbean. Will company director Adam, winery worker Izzy, DJ, poet and business owner Mark and cleaning company owner Chris be inpressed by their hosts efforts?

programme.title: Come Dine with Me
programme.desc: The second host from in and around Basingstoke, business owner Adam, hopes to impress his guests with authentic Mexican cuisine, inspired by a holiday to a resort in Cancún

programme.title: Come Dine with Me
programme.desc: On the third night in Basingstoke, DJ and nutritionist Mark goes down the festival route with both his food and the entertainment, and offers his guests his own filtered water

programme.title: Come Dine with Me
programme.desc: Day four in Basingstoke finds winery worker Izzy planning a sophisticated evening, though whether her fancy approach will prove too much of a risk remains to be seen. DJ and nutritionist Mark irritates Izzy by not sticking to her dress code, while Adam and Chris embrace the black-tie event. Will the self-confessed queen of dinner parties give the guests a night to remember and put herself in the top spot, or will the sophistication be too much for some?

programme.title: Come Dine with Me
programme.desc: The final host from in and around the Hampshire town of Basingstoke is snappy dresser Chris, who hopes to impress his guests with a 90s music dress code and a menu of French dishes made with local produce. Chris has been disappointed with the standard of cooking all week and plans to take it up a notch for the final night, but theres simmering tensions between Mark and well-spoken Izzy

programme.title: Four in a Bed
programme.desc: The competition begins at the Unicorn Inn in Ludlow, Shropshire, where husband and wife team Lee and Zoe Osbourne hope their glamorous fairy-tale style rooms will impress

programme.title: Four in a Bed
programme.desc: The second visit is to the East Walls Hotel in Chichester, West Sussex, owned by history-loving husband and wife Celia and Damon Haughey, who have rejected the boutique label

programme.title: Four in a Bed
programme.desc: The third visit of the week takes place at The Wheatsheaf in Sandbach, Cheshire, where owner Jake Pare and general manager Chris Baldwin hope to impress their guests

programme.title: Four in a Bed
programme.desc: The final visit is to the Shawries Hotel in Blackpool, where fun-loving Allison and Dave Shaw want their guests to feel like part of the family. The dated decor takes Jake and Chris back to their childhood, but Celia and Damon arent fans of the 1980s look or the kiss-me-quick-style Blackpool break. Breakfast is a bargain build-your-own buttie platter, followed by feedback that leaves the competition wide open

programme.title: Four in a Bed
programme.desc: The BandB owners meet for the last time to find out what theyve been paid and to settle some scores. East Walls Hotel is first up, and owners Celia and Damon need to clean up Daves toilet brush troubles before broaching his beef with the breakfast banger

programme.title: The Dog House
programme.desc: Staff at Woodgreen Pets Charity face their busiest challenge yet, with several dogs needing new homes. Sue pulls out all the stops for a trio of long-term residents - the inseparable Chihuahuas Rio, Prince and Blue Boy. Double trouble George and Daisy cant bear to live apart, so any prospective owner has to take on both and have a garden big enough for them. Simone and Drew travel from the West Midlands determined to meet their perfect match. The hopes are that Johnny the excitable terrier will win their hearts

programme.title: Grand Designs
programme.desc: Kevin McCloud follows more of Britains most ambitious self-building projects, as intrepid individuals attempt to design and construct the home of their dreams. Howard and Sarah embark on their most ambitious building project yet - a sleek, angled, metallic floating home on a tidal estuary near Worthing. Designed to look like a boat, and nestled within an idiosyncratic houseboat community, the structure will sit on an experimental prefabricated polystyrene slab to deal with high tides alternating with hours sitting in the mud. Its a huge experiment, with £385,000 to spend over an 18-month schedule, especially as theyll be doing much of the work themselves and finalising the engineering as they go. Things get off to an agonisingly slow start when it takes months to painstakingly remove a condemned D-Day landing craft from the plot before they can even get started and the constant tidal shifts that disrupt any construction creates a real recipe for disaster

programme.title: 24 Hours in AandE
programme.desc: At Nottinghams Queens Medical Centre, 87-year-old Joan is brought in after falling on a moving tram and cutting open the back of her head. programme.title: 24 Hours in AandE

programme.title: The Repair Shop
programme.desc: Jay Blades and the team mark the year of the Queens Platinum Jubilee by bringing four treasured heirlooms, each with a royal connection, back to life. programme.title: Great Irish Interiors
programme.desc: Exploring the restoration efforts at Dublins Newbridge House, an 18th-century Palladian villa in the care of Fingal County Council. Plus, Alec Cobbe shares his useful insights into the history of the house with Cathal

programme.title: Natasha
programme.desc: After surviving a violent assault by a serving soldier - who was convicted but walked free with a suspended sentence - Limerick woman Natasha OBrien refused to stay silent. This documentary follows Natasha as she transforms her trauma into activism and forces a reckoning with the Irish justice system about how it treats gender-based violence

programme.title: The Jetty
programme.desc: Still reeling from her shocking discovery, Ember is desperate to find out what Riz knows about the Amy Knightly case. They begin to share information and Ember tells Riz her suspicions about the identity of Mirandas abuser. Ember is horrified when shes told that the lake is to be searched for Amys remains. When Riz stops returning Embers calls, Ember suspects that its because she has uncovered the terrible truth about what happened to Amy. Crime drama, starring Jenna Coleman and Weruche Opia

programme.title: PJ Gallagher: Changing My Mind
programme.desc: An exploration of mental health in Ireland through the lens of comedian PJ Gall aghers journey to sustain his well-being with ground-breaking therapies, including Psilocybin, mindfulness and talk therapy. PJs journey expands to support others, partnering with advocacy groups to dismantle stigmas and champion mental health progress

programme.title: Build Your Own Home
programme.desc: Clare Islands community centre is at the heart of the island, a multipurpose space that caters for all occasions from deaths, births, communions, workouts and marriages - and everything in between. But manager Maureen Pinder says the building cannot cope with the demands placed upon it and the island is losing revenue as a result. So the team set to work to improve the centre and what it offers, in the hope of attracting young people back to the island during the busy tourist season

Fantasy drama, starring Peter Dinklage, Gwendoline Christie, Maisie Williams and Isaac Hempstead Wright

Fantasy drama, starring Nikolaj Coster-Waldau, John Bradley, Hannah Murray and Maisie Williams

programme.sub-title: In the Name of the Father

Meanwhile, AJ tells his parents a few home truths

programme.title: Game of Thrones
programme.desc: As Jaime weighs up his options, Cersei answers a request, and Tyrions plans bear fruit. Starring Lena Headey, Peter Dinklage and Emilia Clarke

programme.title: The Guest Wing
programme.desc: The Penningtons, owners of Muncaster Castle in the Lake District, discuss the challenges of housing three generations of their family under one roof, while elderly patriarch Patrick struggles to find new purpose following the death of his wife. At Maunsel House in Somerset, Sir Benjamin Slades preconceptions are challenged when a gay mens choir arrives for a weekend break

programme.title: The Guest Wing
programme.desc: At Northumberlands Chillingham Castle, Sir Humphrey Wakefield prepares to hand over the estate to his apprehensive son Maximilian. Hard-working staff at Carlton Towers in North Yorkshire get ready for the arrival of 120 caravan owners for the annual rally and dinner dance

programme.title: Urban Secrets
programme.desc: Alan Cumming heads across the Irish Sea to Dublin, where he succumbs to the citys famous charm and meets some of its most fascinating characters. On a journey that takes in an 18th-century pleasure house and a burlesque life-painting class, Alan also stops off in Temple Bar for a pint with singer Sharon Corr, unlocks a mystery in Irelands oldest library and uncovers a stylish secret that lurks behind the steel shutters of an old lock-up

programme.title: Fish Town
programme.desc: August arrives and the fishermen of Brixham spend time ashore with their families as their boats are repaired - but summer proves costly for Jan, who loses £1,000 for every day his vessel is out of action. Apprentice deckhand Logan has to decide whether a life at sea is the right choice for him and his family, and seafood seller Jenny receives a surprise on her 65th birthday

programme.title: Succession
programme.desc: Logan informs the team about his decision to acquire Pierce, a rival media company. Meanwhile, Connors presidential announcement infuriates Logan

programme.title: Succession
programme.desc: Kendall and Logan arrange a secret meeting with PGM CEO Rhea Jarrell. Meanwhile, Roman begins a management training programme, and Connor and Willa attend a funeral

programme.title: The Sopranos

programme.title: All Her Fault
programme.desc: Alcaras struggles to balance work and home life and must make a choice when he is tempted by an offer that goes against his morals

programme.title: The Death of Bunny Munro
programme.desc: Desperate to get back to work and escape his grief, Bunny and Junior hit the road, but while Libbys appearances provide comfort for his son, she haunts Bunny, who tries to fill the void by seducing his customers. However, the pressures of taking care of Junior leads to him repeatedly striking out. Bunnys desperation comes to a head when he leaves Junior in a hotel room to make a late-night sales call

programme.title: Succession
programme.desc: Hoping to work the angles, Kendall and Roman ask Shiv to invite a campaign insider to Logans pre-election day party. Starring Jeremy Strong, Sarah Snook and Kieran Culkin

programme.title: The Sopranos
programme.desc: Tony receives a warning about Phil Leotardos plan to take action against him, prompting the mobster to draft in Paulie to make the first move. However, an innocent family becomes the victim of mistaken identity when the Italians open fire in Queens. Elsewhere, Dr Melfi ends Tonys therapy sessions. Drama, starring James Gandolfini and Frank Vincent

programme.title: The Penguin
programme.desc: Hoping to control the future of Gothams drug trade, Oz and Sofia must first address the skeletons in their closet. Victor is torn between his new life and what remains of his old

programme.title: Game of Thrones
programme.desc: As the Starks prepare to fight, Davos loses something dear, while Ramsay plays a game and Daenerys faces a choice

programme.title: Game of Thrones
programme.desc: As Cersei awaits judgement, Walder Frey and Jaime celebrate at Riverrun. Meanwhile, winter finally arrives. Lena Headey, Peter Dinklage and Emilia Clarke star

programme.title: Fish Town
programme.desc: Life in the Devon fishing port of Brixham. Spring is in the air, and the town is a hive of activity as skippers return their pleasure yachts to the water after winter in the dry dock, while the pressure is on for Brixham to look its best for the arrival of Princess Anne, who will officially open the new £20million fish market, and the start of the summer season

programme.title: King Kong
programme.desc: Maverick film-maker Carl Denham and his cast and crew board a ship bound for a mysterious island - but when they arrive, a giant gorilla carries off their leading lady, Ann Darrow. As the crew makes its way through the teeming jungle to find her, the director concocts a dangerous scheme to capture the great ape and take it back to New York. Peter Jacksons remake of the fantasy adventure, starring Naomi Watts, Jack Black, Adrien Brody and Andy Serkis, in a dual role as the ships cook and motion-captured creature

programme.title: Novocaine
programme.desc: When the woman of his dreams is kidnapped, a man turns an inability to feel physical pain into an unexpected advantage in his quest to rescue her. Action comedy, starring Jack Quaid, Ray Nicholson and Amber Midthunder

programme.title: Kraven the Hunter
programme.desc: Conservationist Sergei Kravinoffs complex relationship with his ruthless father, Nikolai, sets him on a path of vengeance with brutal consequences, motivating him to become Kraven, the worlds most feared hunter. Fantasy adventure, starring Aaron Taylor-Johnson, Russell Crowe and Ariana Debose

programme.title: Venom
programme.desc: While exploring space for new worlds, a probe belonging to the Life Foundation discovers a comet covered in symbiotic lifeforms. Following the probes return to Earth, journalist Eddie Brock investigates sinister trials being carried out by the corporation, and after being infected by an alien symbiote, develops superhuman strength and power. Fantasy adventure, starring Tom Hardy and Riz Ahmed

programme.title: Venom: Let There Be Carnage
programme.desc: Struggling to cope with his alter ego Venom, Eddie Brock attempts to re-ignite his journalistic career by interviewing serial killer Cletus Kasady. However, Kasady becomes the host of the symbiote Carnage and escapes prison after a failed execution. Comic-book fantasy sequel, directed by Andy Serkis and starring Tom Hardy, Woody Harrelson and Michelle Williams

programme.title: Venom: The Last Dance
programme.desc: Journalist Eddie Brock and symbiote partner-in-crime Venom are lying low in Mexico City, on the run for the apparent murder of detective Patrick Mulligan. The cop and his bonded entity, Toxin, are actually alive at the Imperium symbiote containment programme, beneath the Area 51 US Air Force facility in the Nevada desert. Knull, the symbiotes immortal creator, dispatches hunters to locate Venoms hidden power source, the Codex, which can set Knull free to terrorise the multiverse. Fantasy adventure, starring Tom Hardy, Chiwetel Ejiofor, Stephen Graham and Juno Temple

programme.title: Man of Steel
programme.desc: With the imminent destruction of their home planet approaching, a man and his wife seek to preserve their race by sending their infant son to Earth. The childs spacecraft lands at the farm of Jonathan and Martha Kent, who name him Clark and raise him as their own son. Though his extraordinary abilities have led to the adult Clark living on the fringe of society, he is forced to take a stand to protect his adopted home from a fanatical general from his own world, who intends to wipe out the human race. Sci-fi adventure based on the Superman comic-books, starring Henry Cavill, Amy Adams, Michael Shannon and Russell Crowe

programme.title: Justice League
programme.desc: Fuelled by his restored faith in humanity and inspired by Supermans selfless act, Bruce Wayne enlists the help of newfound ally Diana Prince to face an even greater enemy. Together, Batman and Wonder Woman work quickly to find and recruit a team of meta-humans to stand against supervillain Steppenwolf, but despite the help of Aquaman, Cyborg and The Flash, it may already be too late to save the planet. Sci-fi adventure, starring Ben Affleck, Gal Gadot and Henry Cavill

programme.title: Saving Private Ryan
programme.desc: In the aftermath of the Normandy landings, a group of American soldiers scours the battlefields of France in search of a missing infantryman, who has been given compassionate leave to return home because his brothers have been killed in the conflict. Steven Spielbergs Oscar-winning Second World War drama, starring Tom Hanks, Tom Sizemore, Edward Burns, Matt Damon, Barry Pepper and Vin Diesel. It won five Academy Awards, including Best Cinematography, Best Film Editing, and Best Director. The film makers also took home a couple of Baftas for Best Sound and Best Special Effects

programme.title: Love Hurts
programme.desc: An estate agent is pulled back into the life he left behind after his former partner-in-crime resurfaces with an ominous message. Action comedy, starring Ke Huy Quan, Ariana DeBose, Mustafa Shakir and Lio Tipton

programme.title: Superman IV: The Quest for Peace
programme.desc: The Man of Steel embarks on a mission to destroy every nuclear weapon on the planet. However, his arch-enemy Lex Luthor sees the chance to rid himself of the superhero by creating a deadly radioactive henchman who causes havoc around the world. Comic-book adventure sequel, starring Christopher Reeve, Gene Hackman, Mark Pillow and Margot Kidder

programme.title: Indiana Jones and the Kingdom of the Crystal Skull
programme.desc: The globe-trotting archaeologist teams up with a rebellious teenager who draws him into a search in the Amazon jungle for a mysterious artefact of untold power. But their quest is hindered by Soviet agents who also want the fabled object for a more sinister purpose. Action adventure sequel, starring Harrison Ford, Cate Blanchett, Shia LaBeouf, Ray Winstone and John Hurt

A scientist learns the world is soon to face a global cataclysm that will wipe out the human race, but finds the US president has plans to secretly save a fraction of the population, leaving everyone else to die. A writer learns of this scheme, and as the world is devastated by earthquakes and volcanic eruptions, he tries to get his family to the last safe refuge. Disaster epic, starring John Cusack and Chiwetel Ejiofor

programme.title: Superman
programme.desc: A fledgling superhero crash-lands on Earth after evacuation from his home planet and is taken in by an elderly couple who raise him as their own. But with adolescence comes a greater understanding of his superhuman powers, leading to his rebirth as a crusader for justice and defender of the American way of life. Comic-strip adventure, with Christopher Reeve, Gene Hackman, Margot Kidder and Marlon Brando

programme.title: Superman II
programme.desc: The Man of Steel meets his match in the form of three fugitive villains from his home planet of Krypton. Flying down to Earth, the super-powered trio unleash a reign of terror in a bid to take over the world - but Superman is not there to stop them, having surrendered his powers to lead a normal life with his beloved Lois Lane. Comic-strip adventure sequel, with Christopher Reeve, Gene Hackman, Terence Stamp and Margot Kidder

programme.title: Justice League
programme.desc: Fuelled by his restored faith in humanity and inspired by Supermans selfless act, Bruce Wayne enlists the help of newfound ally Diana Prince to face an even greater enemy. Together, Batman and Wonder Woman work quickly to find and recruit a team of meta-humans to stand against supervillain Steppenwolf, but despite the help of Aquaman, Cyborg and The Flash, it may already be too late to save the planet. Sci-fi adventure, starring Ben Affleck, Gal Gadot and Henry Cavill

programme.title: Twisters
programme.desc: Meteorologist Kate Cooper crosses paths with social media star Tyler Owens. He recklessly chases storms with his crew and gleefully posts their daredevil exploits, as multiple storm systems converge over central Oklahoma. Standalone disaster sequel, starring Daisy Edgar-Jones and Glen Powell

programme.title: Terminator Salvation
programme.desc: In a world dominated by deadly robots, resistance leader John Connor fights to stop the creation of an advanced new terminator, and searches for the teenager destined to go back in time and become his father. Elsewhere, a mysterious stranger with no memory is about to learn the shocking truth about his origins. Sci-fi thriller sequel, starring Christian Bale, Sam Worthington and Anton Yelchin

programme.title: Enter the Dragon
programme.desc: A powerful crime kingpin hosts a martial arts tournament on his island lair. A former Shaolin monk is recruited by an intelligence agency to enter the tournament and expose the crime lords opium and slavery rings. He finds himself fighting for his life alongside two Vietnam veterans who are both fleeing their own enemies. Thriller, starring Bruce Lee, John Saxon, Jim Kelly and Kien Shih

programme.title: Man of Steel
programme.desc: With the imminent destruction of their home planet approaching, a man and his wife seek to preserve their race by sending their infant son to Earth. The childs spacecraft lands at the farm of Jonathan and Martha Kent, who name him Clark and raise him as their own son. Though his extraordinary abilities have led to the adult Clark living on the fringe of society, he is forced to take a stand to protect his adopted home from a fanatical general from his own world, who intends to wipe out the human race. Sci-fi adventure based on the Superman comic-books, starring Henry Cavill, Amy Adams, Michael Shannon and Russell Crowe

programme.title: The Sloth Lane
programme.desc: After a storm wrecks their home, a speedy sloth called Laura and her eccentric family move to the big city in their rusted food truck in the hope of making their business a success. Animated adventure, with the voices of Leslie Jones and Remy Hii

programme.title: Cloudy with a Chance of Meatballs
programme.desc: An incompetent scientist finally invents something that works - a machine that turns water into food. When the device gets launched into the atmosphere, it has a strange effect on his towns weather, causing giant meals to fall from the sky to the delight of the residents - until it gets out of control. Animated comedy, with the voices of Bill Hader, Anna Faris and James Caan

programme.title: Smallfoot
programme.desc: A village of Yetis lives on the top of a mountain in the Himalayas, hidden away from sight. An epic journey ensues when one of the clan named Migo stumbles across a real human being - but is banished from his snowy home when no-one believes him. Animated adventure, with the voices of Channing Tatum and James Corden

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda 3
programme.desc: The clumsy hero is reunited with his long-lost father, whose help he will need when a supernatural foe threatens all of China. Father and son travel to a secret village populated by other pandas, and must train them in martial arts so they can defend their home. Animated comedy sequel, with the voices of Jack Black, Bryan Cranston, Angelina Jolie and Dustin Hoffman

programme.title: Despicable Me
programme.desc: A criminal mastermind hopes to seal his reputation as the greatest villain of them all by stealing the Moon. First he needs to get his hands on a shrinking ray owned by a rival evil genius, and adopts three orphan girls to help him - but finds that fatherhood brings out his long-buried caring side. Animated comedy, with the voices of Steve Carell, Jason Segel, Russell Brand and Julie Andrews

programme.title: The Emoji Movie
programme.desc: In a world of living ideograms, multi-expressional emoji Gene embarks on a daring mission to find notorious hacker Jailbreak. Animated adventure, featuring the voices of TJ Miller, James Corden and Patrick Stewart

programme.title: Cloudy with a Chance of Meatballs 2
programme.desc: A scientist believes he has saved the world from his invention, a machine that accidentally turned water into food. However, he learns the device is still active and has created a race of food/animal hybrids that he must stop from running wild across the world. Animated comedy sequel, with the voices of Bill Hader, Anna Faris and James Caan

programme.title: Captain Underpants: The First Epic Movie
programme.desc: George and Harold, a pair of elementary school pranksters, inadvertently transform their mean-spirited principal into a daring vigilante. Cartoon adventure based on the best-selling series of books, featuring the voices of Kevin Hart, Thomas Middleditch and Ed Helms

programme.title: Piece By Piece
programme.desc: Pharrell Williams tells the story of his life - through the lens of Lego animation. With an all-star cast, including Kendrick Lamar, Gwen Stefani and Snoop Dogg

programme.title: Noahs Ark
programme.desc: Tom and Vini are mice who stow away on Noahs ark. They must use their musical talents to enter a competition and help maintain peace among the animals. Animated adventure, featuring the voices of Rodrigo Santoro and Marcelo Adnet

programme.title: Teen Titans Go! To The Movies
programme.desc: Five teenage superheroes, miffed by the fact they arent deemed worthy enough for their own big screen films, set out to prove themselves by tackling the villainous Slade and his maniacal plan for world domination. Animated adventure, featuring the voices of Greg Cipes, Scott Menville, Khary Payton, Will Arnett and Nicolas Cage

programme.title: Teen Titans Go! and DC Super Hero Girls: Mayhem in the Multiverse
programme.desc: Lex Luthor poses a threat to Teen Titans and DC Super Hero Girls, who reunite to combat Supermans arch enemy. Animated adventure, with the voices of Kimberly Brooks, Greg Cipes and Will Friedle

programme.title: Rebellious
programme.desc: A princess is kidnapped by an evil sorcerer and her scholarly fiance must use his wits in an epic quest to find her, while she boldly challenges her captors and plots a daring escape. Animated fantasy adventure, with the voices of Vanessa Johansson and Marc Thompson

programme.title: Tom and Jerry Cowboy Up!
programme.desc: The feuding duo wind up in the Wild West where they help save a ranch from the hands of a villain. They also try to help a cowgirl and her brother save their homestead from a greedy land-grabber. Animated adventure, with the voices of George Ackles and Sean Burgos

programme.title: Captain Underpants: The First Epic Movie
programme.desc: George and Harold, a pair of elementary school pranksters, inadvertently transform their mean-spirited principal into a daring vigilante. Cartoon adventure based on the best-selling series of books, featuring the voices of Kevin Hart, Thomas Middleditch and Ed Helms

programme.title: Paws of Fury: The Legend of Hank
programme.desc: A down-on-his-luck hound named Hank finds himself in a town full of cats, who need a hero to defend them from a ruthless villains evil plot to wipe their village off the map. With help from a reluctant teacher to train him, Hank must assume the role of town samurai and team up with the villagers to save the day. Animated comedy, with the voices of Michael Cera, Ricky Gervais and Samuel L Jackson

programme.title: The Emoji Movie
programme.desc: In a world of living ideograms, multi-expressional emoji Gene embarks on a daring mission to find notorious hacker Jailbreak. Animated adventure, featuring the voices of TJ Miller, James Corden and Patrick Stewart

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda 3
programme.desc: The clumsy hero is reunited with his long-lost father, whose help he will need when a supernatural foe threatens all of China. Father and son travel to a secret village populated by other pandas, and must train them in martial arts so they can defend their home. Animated comedy sequel, with the voices of Jack Black, Bryan Cranston, Angelina Jolie and Dustin Hoffman

programme.title: Monsters vs Aliens
programme.desc: A woman is exposed to radiation from a meteorite that causes her to grow to an enormous size during her wedding. She is captured by the military and held prisoner with an assortment of strange creatures - but when aliens invade, these freaks of nature are the only ones capable of saving the world. Animated sci-fi comedy, with the voices of Reese Witherspoon and Hugh Laurie

programme.title: Shrek
programme.desc: Anti-social ogre Shrek resolves to stop an evil ruler from banishing fairy-tale characters to his swampland home. However, the reluctant hero ends up forced to rescue the beautiful Princess Fiona from a castle guarded by a dragon, aided only by a wisecracking donkey. Animated comedy, with the voices of Mike Myers, John Lithgow, Cameron Diaz, Eddie Murphy and Vincent Cassel

programme.title: Transformers One
programme.desc: Years before the sentient robots became arch enemies, Optimus Prime and Megatron were friends on their home planet of Cybertron. However, their feud changes the universe forever. Animated sci-fi adventure, with the voices of Chris Hemsworth, Brian Tyree Henry, Scarlett Johansson and Keegan-Michael Key

programme.title: Rebellious
programme.desc: A princess is kidnapped by an evil sorcerer and her scholarly fiance must use his wits in an epic quest to find her, while she boldly challenges her captors and plots a daring escape. Animated fantasy adventure, with the voices of Vanessa Johansson and Marc Thompson

programme.title: Open Season: Scared Silly
programme.desc: Boog, Elliot and their pals team up to track down an elusive werewolf and prevent their forest from being intruded upon by hunter Shaw. Animation, with the voice of Will Townsend and Donny Lucas

programme.title: Tom and Jerry Cowboy Up!
programme.desc: The feuding duo wind up in the Wild West where they help save a ranch from the hands of a villain. They also try to help a cowgirl and her brother save their homestead from a greedy land-grabber. Animated adventure, with the voices of George Ackles and Sean Burgos

programme.title: Fox and Hare Save the Forest
programme.desc: A fox and a hare embark on a journey to find their missing owl friend. Animated adventure, with the voices of Teresa Gallagher, Dan Skinner and Sarah Madigan

programme.title: The Road to El Dorado
programme.desc: Two Spanish conmen set off for South America on a quest to discover the legendary City of Gold, but soon find themselves in the enviable position of being worshipped as gods by the natives - much to the displeasure of a local priest. Animated musical adventure, with the voices of Kevin Kline, Kenneth Branagh, Rosie Perez, Armand Assante and Edward James Olmos, and featuring a soundtrack by Elton John

programme.title: Christmas with the Kranks
programme.desc: A married couple from Chicago decide to steer clear of the usual festive celebrations and keep their cash for a holiday in the sun, prompting a busybody neighbour to call on the local community to pull out all the stops to make them change their minds. Festive comedy based on a novel by John Grisham, starring Jamie Lee Curtis, Tim Allen, Dan Aykroyd and M Emmet Walsh

programme.title: The Night Before Christmas In Wonderland
programme.desc: As the Queen of Hearts has outlawed the festive season, with the help of a curious young Alice, Father Christmas attempts to put things right. Lewis Carroll-inspired animated adventure, with the voices of Gerard Butler, Emilia Clarke and Simone Ashley

programme.title: Fred Claus
programme.desc: Santas selfish brother Fred has been ostracised by his family for years, but when his crooked ways land him in jail, his brother comes along to bail him out on one condition - he must return to the family business and make toys for Christmas. But instead of cleaning up his act, Fred pushes Santas patience to the limit with his far from festive attitude. Comedy, starring Vince Vaughn, Paul Giamatti, Rachel Weisz, Miranda Richardson and Kevin Spacey

programme.title: The Holiday
programme.desc: Two single women living on opposite sides of the Atlantic agree to exchange houses over the Christmas holidays. In their new surroundings, both women unexpectedly encounter prospective partners, but as the house swap draws to a close, difficult decisions have to be made about their blossoming relationships. Romantic comedy, starring Cameron Diaz, Kate Winslet, Jack Black, Jude Law and Eli Wallach

programme.title: Little Women
programme.desc: Four sisters are raised by their strong-willed mother while their father is away fighting in the American Civil War. Although one yearns to become a writer and another dreams of being married, the girls remain firmly united as the family steers a course through hard times and tragic events. Period drama, based on Louisa May Alcotts novel, with Winona Ryder, Susan Sarandon, Claire Danes, Samantha Mathis and Kirsten Dunst

programme.title: The Best Christmas Pageant Ever
programme.desc: Nobody is ready for the mayhem that ensues when six of the worst youngsters disrupt the towns annual Christmas performance. Festive comedy based on the Barbara Robinson novel, starring Lauren Graham, Judy Greer and Pete Holmes

programme.title: Love Actually
programme.desc: Ten interlinked stories of people searching for and finding love. While the newly elected, bachelor British prime minister is smitten by a junior staff member at 10 Downing Street, a heartbroken writer heads for France to get over a failed relationship, and a faded rock star aims to reinvent himself in time for Christmas. Richard Curtiss romantic comedy, with Hugh Grant, Martine McCutcheon, Emma Thompson, Alan Rickman, Colin Firth, Bill Nighy and Liam Neeson

programme.title: Genie
programme.desc: A workaholic enlists the help of a magical genie to help win his family back before Christmas. Remake of Richard Curtiss 1991 comedy Bernard and the Genie, starring Melissa McCarthy, Paapa Essiedu and Alan Cumming

programme.title: Christmas with the Kranks
programme.desc: A married couple from Chicago decide to steer clear of the usual festive celebrations and keep their cash for a holiday in the sun, prompting a busybody neighbour to call on the local community to pull out all the stops to make them change their minds. Festive comedy based on a novel by John Grisham, starring Jamie Lee Curtis, Tim Allen, Dan Aykroyd and M Emmet Walsh

programme.title: Fred Claus
programme.desc: Santas selfish brother Fred has been ostracised by his family for years, but when his crooked ways land him in jail, his brother comes along to bail him out on one condition - he must return to the family business and make toys for Christmas. But instead of cleaning up his act, Fred pushes Santas patience to the limit with his far from festive attitude. Comedy, starring Vince Vaughn, Paul Giamatti, Rachel Weisz, Miranda Richardson and Kevin Spacey

programme.title: Nativity 2: Danger in the Manger!
programme.desc: A primary school teacher enters his class in a Song for Christmas competition, and ends up having to lead the busload of excitable kids - as well as his irresponsible teaching assistant - on a disastrous trip to Wales for the event. The journey also leads to an unwanted confrontation with his high-flying twin brother. Comedy sequel, starring David Tennant, Marc Wootton, Joanna Page and Jessica Hynes

programme.title: Nativity 3: Dude, Wheres My Donkey?!
programme.desc: The pupils of St Bernadettes face a new challenge as Christmas approaches, when their new teacher loses his memory, forgetting everything about the festive season and that he is about to get married. It falls to the kids, led by excitable teacher Mr Poppy, to help him remember both in time for the wedding. Comedy sequel, starring Martin Clunes, Catherine Tate, Marc Wootton and Celia Imrie

programme.title: Genie
programme.desc: A workaholic enlists the help of a magical genie to help win his family back before Christmas. Remake of Richard Curtiss 1991 comedy Bernard and the Genie, starring Melissa McCarthy, Paapa Essiedu and Alan Cumming

programme.title: This Is Christmas
programme.desc: Romantic comedy set during the Christmas season, following Adam and Emma on their daily commute from the village of Langton to London, where they meet the same passengers every day. Starring Alfred Enoch, Kaya Scodelario, Joanna Scanlan and Timothy Spall

programme.title: The Polar Express
programme.desc: A boy begins to doubt whether Father Christmas really exists as he waits for the sound of sleigh bells on Christmas Eve. But he and hundreds of other lucky children receive a shock when a magical steam engine arrives in the night to take them to the North Pole and meet the man himself. Robert Zemeckis animated adventure, based on Chris Van Allsburgs book, features the voices of Tom Hanks, Leslie Zemeckis and Eddie Deezen

programme.title: The Grinch
programme.desc: In the magical town of Whoville, a race of human-like creatures called Whos are thrilled about celebrating Christmas. However, a cantankerous, furry green loner named the Grinch, who lives in a cave north of Whoville, hatches a dastardly scheme to ruin the festive season. Animated Dr Seuss adaptation, with the voices of Benedict Cumberbatch, Pharrell Williams and Rashida Jones

programme.title: Nativity 2: Danger in the Manger!
programme.desc: A primary school teacher enters his class in a Song for Christmas competition, and ends up having to lead the busload of excitable kids - as well as his irresponsible teaching assistant - on a disastrous trip to Wales for the event. The journey also leads to an unwanted confrontation with his high-flying twin brother. Comedy sequel, starring David Tennant, Marc Wootton, Joanna Page and Jessica Hynes

programme.title: Genie
programme.desc: A workaholic enlists the help of a magical genie to help win his family back before Christmas. Remake of Richard Curtiss 1991 comedy Bernard and the Genie, starring Melissa McCarthy, Paapa Essiedu and Alan Cumming

programme.title: The Polar Express
programme.desc: A boy begins to doubt whether Father Christmas really exists as he waits for the sound of sleigh bells on Christmas Eve. But he and hundreds of other lucky children receive a shock when a magical steam engine arrives in the night to take them to the North Pole and meet the man himself. Robert Zemeckis animated adventure, based on Chris Van Allsburgs book, features the voices of Tom Hanks, Leslie Zemeckis and Eddie Deezen

programme.title: Elf
programme.desc: A child is taken in by kind-hearted Santa and raised as an elf - so it comes as a shock when he discovers years later that he is in fact human. Deciding to get back to his roots, he heads off for New York in search of his long-lost family, but is ill-prepared for the hustle and bustle of the Big Apple. Fantasy comedy, starring Will Ferrell, James Caan, Zooey Deschanel and Edward Asner

programme.title: Daddys Home 2
programme.desc: Having settled their differences, Brad and Dustys newfound friendship is put to the test when their respective fathers - one gentle, the other overly macho - arrive for the Christmas holidays, forcing them to change their plans. What starts as a break at a fun-filled trip to a luxury resort turns into something far more chaotic. Comedy, starring Will Ferrell, Mark Wahlberg, Mel Gibson and John Lithgow

programme.title: Planes, Trains and Automobiles
programme.desc: A stressed businessman just wants to make it home to spend Thanksgiving with his family. However, when his flight is forced to land miles from its destination, he finds himself sharing a disaster-strewn journey across America with an amiable but slobbish salesman. Comedy road movie, starring Steve Martin, John Candy, Laila Robins, Kevin Bacon and Michael McKean

programme.title: Office Christmas Party
programme.desc: When a CEO threatens drastic action to improve the financial performance of the Chicago branch of her company, the affected manager - who is also her brother - throws an epic festive party to impress a client and close a potential sale which would save jobs. Comedy, starring Jason Bateman and Jennifer Aniston

programme.title: Fred Claus
programme.desc: Santas selfish brother Fred has been ostracised by his family for years, but when his crooked ways land him in jail, his brother comes along to bail him out on one condition - he must return to the family business and make toys for Christmas. But instead of cleaning up his act, Fred pushes Santas patience to the limit with his far from festive attitude. Comedy, starring Vince Vaughn, Paul Giamatti, Rachel Weisz, Miranda Richardson and Kevin Spacey

programme.title: Paul Blart: Mall Cop
programme.desc: A single father is determined to become a police officer but fails the medical because he is overweight. To compensate, he goes to absurd lengths to succeed in his job as a security guard, but when criminals lay siege to his place of work, he finds his opportunity to prove his worth to law enforcement. Comedy, starring Kevin James and Keir ODonnell

programme.title: The Mountain
programme.desc: Sam, a fearless young girl raised outside of her Maori culture, is determined to connect with a mountain in the hope it can cure her cancer. Along the way she meets new friends Mallory and Bronco. Co-writer/director Rachel Houses comedy, starring Elizabeth Atkinson, Reuben Francis, Terence Daniel and Byron Coll

programme.title: The Witches
programme.desc: A boy goes on holiday with his grandmother to a seaside hotel hosting a convention of witches, who have come together to hear their leaders plan to turn all the children in England into mice. When the chief hag discovers the young lad eavesdropping at their meeting, she decides to make him one of her first victims. Childrens fantasy directed by Nicolas Roeg, based on the book by Roald Dahl, and starring Anjelica Huston, Mai Zetterling, Jasen Fisher, Jane Horrocks, Rowan Atkinson and Brenda Blethyn

programme.title: Mr Beans Holiday
programme.desc: The bumbling fool wins first prize in the church raffle - a trip to France and a video camera. His travels cause chaos as he disrupts a film shoot in Cannes, to the fury of its megalomaniac director, and is then accused of kidnapping a youngster. Comedy, starring Rowan Atkinson, Willem Dafoe, Emma de Caunes and Max Baldry

programme.title: The Flintstones
programme.desc: Blue-collar caveman Fred Flintstone is promoted to an executive position at work and unwittingly becomes embroiled in an embezzlement scheme - thanks in no small part to his seductive new assistant. Live-action version of the cartoon comedy, starring John Goodman, Rick Moranis, Rosie ODonnell, Halle Berry and Elizabeth Taylor

programme.title: The Polar Express
programme.desc: A boy begins to doubt whether Father Christmas really exists as he waits for the sound of sleigh bells on Christmas Eve. But he and hundreds of other lucky children receive a shock when a magical steam engine arrives in the night to take them to the North Pole and meet the man himself. Robert Zemeckis animated adventure, based on Chris Van Allsburgs book, features the voices of Tom Hanks, Leslie Zemeckis and Eddie Deezen

programme.title: Lemony Snickets A Series of Unfortunate Events
programme.desc: Three orphans are entrusted into the care of their sinister uncle, a master of disguise who intends to kill them for the family fortune. Quickly realising he is up to no good, the children flee, moving from one prospective guardian to the next - but their wily relative is never far behind. Comedy adventure based on the childrens books, starring Jim Carrey, Meryl Streep, Jude Law, Liam Aitken and Emily Browning, with Kara and Shelby Hoffman

programme.title: IF
programme.desc: A young girl called named Bea goes through a difficult time with her father and suddenly gains the ability to see imaginary friends (IFs). Bea learns her upstairs neighbour Cal also possesses the same power and they join forces to matchmake IFs with new children. Fantasy adventure, starring Ryan Reynolds and Cailey Fleming, with John Krasinski, who also wrote and directed

programme.title: Monster Trucks
programme.desc: A drilling operation unleashes a subterranean creature which feeds on oil. The monster bonds with a monster truck which a local teenager is building from spare parts, and the youngster befriends the beast and helps it to return to its underground home. Fantasy adventure, starring Lucas Till and Jane Levy

programme.title: Bean
programme.desc: The hapless fool is employed as a security guard for a British art gallery and is sent to Los Angeles to bring back a famous painting. Unfortunately, he finds himself mistaken for a renowned art professor and invited to make an important presentation. Mel Smiths British comedy, starring Rowan Atkinson, Burt Reynolds, Peter MacNicol, John Mills, Peter Capaldi and June Brown

programme.title: Finding Neverland
programme.desc: Fact-based period drama based on the life of Peter Pan author JM Barrie. As a young-at-heart playwright, Barrie is uncomfortable with life in the critical spotlight. However, his friendship with four boys and their free-spirited widowed mother brings him the inspiration for his greatest work. Starring Johnny Depp, Kate Winslet, Dustin Hoffman, Julie Christie, Freddie Highmore and Kelly Macdonald

programme.title: The Mountain
programme.desc: Sam, a fearless young girl raised outside of her Maori culture, is determined to connect with a mountain in the hope it can cure her cancer. Along the way she meets new friends Mallory and Bronco. Co-writer/director Rachel Houses comedy, starring Elizabeth Atkinson, Reuben Francis, Terence Daniel and Byron Coll

programme.title: A Tigers Journey
programme.desc: In the valleys of the Himalayas, an orphan boy saves a Bengal tiger cub from the poachers who killed the creatures mother. Together they head for a monastery in Bhutan known as the Tigers Nest, where Buddhist monks took refuge after the 1950 Chinese invasion of Tibet and protect the big cats. Drama, starring Sunny Pawar, Claudia Gerini and Amandeep Singh

programme.title: The Spiderwick Chronicles
programme.desc: Life for identical twins Jared and Simon and their sister Mallory begins afresh when their mother inherits a spooky mansion. But after moving in, strange things begin to happen, and as the youngsters investigate, they discover a book that opens up a mysterious world of amazing supernatural creatures. Fantasy adventure, starring Freddie Highmore in a dual role alongside Sarah Bolger and Nick Nolte

programme.title: A Tigers Journey
programme.desc: In the valleys of the Himalayas, an orphan boy saves a Bengal tiger cub from the poachers who killed the creatures mother. Together they head for a monastery in Bhutan known as the Tigers Nest, where Buddhist monks took refuge after the 1950 Chinese invasion of Tibet and protect the big cats. Drama, starring Sunny Pawar, Claudia Gerini and Amandeep Singh

programme.title: IF
programme.desc: A young girl called named Bea goes through a difficult time with her father and suddenly gains the ability to see imaginary friends (IFs). Bea learns her upstairs neighbour Cal also possesses the same power and they join forces to matchmake IFs with new children. Fantasy adventure, starring Ryan Reynolds and Cailey Fleming, with John Krasinski, who also wrote and directed

programme.title: Fred Claus
programme.desc: Santas selfish brother Fred has been ostracised by his family for years, but when his crooked ways land him in jail, his brother comes along to bail him out on one condition - he must return to the family business and make toys for Christmas. But instead of cleaning up his act, Fred pushes Santas patience to the limit with his far from festive attitude. Comedy, starring Vince Vaughn, Paul Giamatti, Rachel Weisz, Miranda Richardson and Kevin Spacey

programme.title: The SpongeBob Movie: Sponge Out of Water
programme.desc: The cheery sea creature tries to prevent a precious secret formula from falling into the wrong hands - but when it goes missing, the end of the world approaches. SpongeBob and his friends embark on a quest to get it back, which leads to them developing superpowers and venturing onto dry land. Animated comedy, with the voices of Tom Kenny and Antonio Banderas

programme.title: Peter Rabbit
programme.desc: A mischievous rabbit has the run of a farm and its vegetable patch when the owner unexpectedly dies. When a relative inherits the property, he strives to rid his land of the rabbit and his woodland friends - but his feelings for a nature-loving woman complicate the battle of wits with the animal kingdom. Family comedy based on Beatrix Potters stories, starring Domhnall Gleeson and Rose Byrne, with the voices of James Corden and Margot Robbie

programme.title: Fantastic Beasts: The Crimes of Grindelwald
programme.desc: In 1927, the Magical Congress of the United States of America transfers the dark wizard Gellert Grindelwald to Europe to stand trial, but he escapes. In an attempt to scupper the evil sorcerers plans of raising pure-blood wizards to rule over all non-magical beings, Albus Dumbledore enlists his former student Newt Scamander to help. Second part of JK Rowlings Harry Potter prequel saga, starring Eddie Redmayne, Johnny Depp, Katherine Waterston and Jude Law

programme.title: Jumanji
programme.desc: A man who has been trapped inside a mysterious jungle board game for 26 years is eventually freed when two children start to play it. Unfortunately, he arrives with a rampaging horde of animals on his heels, leaving only one solution - to finish the game he started all those years ago. Fantasy adventure, starring Robin Williams, Kirsten Dunst and Bonnie Hunt

programme.title: Mr Beans Holiday
programme.desc: The bumbling fool wins first prize in the church raffle - a trip to France and a video camera. His travels cause chaos as he disrupts a film shoot in Cannes, to the fury of its megalomaniac director, and is then accused of kidnapping a youngster. Comedy, starring Rowan Atkinson, Willem Dafoe, Emma de Caunes and Max Baldry

programme.title: Ghostbusters: Frozen Empire
programme.desc: The discovery of an ancient relic leads the Ghostbusters old and new to join forces to stop a second ice age. Supernatural comedy adventure sequel, starring Paul Rudd, Carrie Coon, Mckenna Grace and Finn Wolfhard

programme.title: Blueback
programme.desc: A youngster befriends a wild blue fish and takes on the poachers threatening it. Director Robert Connollys drama based on the novel by Tim Winton, starring Mia Wasikowska, Eric Bana and Ariel Donoghue

programme.title: The Flintstones
programme.desc: Blue-collar caveman Fred Flintstone is promoted to an executive position at work and unwittingly becomes embroiled in an embezzlement scheme - thanks in no small part to his seductive new assistant. Live-action version of the cartoon comedy, starring John Goodman, Rick Moranis, Rosie ODonnell, Halle Berry and Elizabeth Taylor

programme.title: A Keller Christmas Vacation
programme.desc: Three reluctant adult siblings join their parents on a Christmas river cruise through Europe, each dealing with personal issues. Drama, starring Brandon Routh (Superman Returns), Jonathan Bennett and Eden Sher

programme.title: The Friend
programme.desc: When a solitary writer adopts and bonds with a Great Dane that belonged to a late friend, she begins to come to terms with her past and her own creative inner life. Drama based on the novel by Sigrid Nunez, starring Naomi Watts and Bill Murray

programme.title: Three Wisest Men
programme.desc: Three siblings deal with personal changes and their mothers decision to sell the family home before Christmas. Between in-laws, wild animals, and a mall Santa, they try to make the holidays perfect. Drama, starring Paul Campbell, Tyler Hynes, Andrew Walker and Margaret Colin

programme.title: The Best Christmas Pageant Ever
programme.desc: Nobody is ready for the mayhem that ensues when six of the worst youngsters disrupt the towns annual Christmas performance. Festive comedy based on the Barbara Robinson novel, starring Lauren Graham, Judy Greer and Pete Holmes

programme.title: Opus
programme.desc: A writer travels to the remote compound of pop star Alfred Moretti, where she discovers the twisted plans of his cult. Writer/director Mark Anthony Greens thriller, starring Ayo Edebiri, John Malkovich and Juliette Lewis

programme.title: The Friend
programme.desc: When a solitary writer adopts and bonds with a Great Dane that belonged to a late friend, she begins to come to terms with her past and her own creative inner life. Drama based on the novel by Sigrid Nunez, starring Naomi Watts and Bill Murray

programme.title: Drop
programme.desc: A widowed mothers first date in years takes a chilling turn when shes bombarded with anonymous threatening phone messages during their dinner, leaving her questioning if her charming suitor is behind the harassment. Director Christopher Landons thriller, starring Meghann Fahy and Brandon Sklenar

programme.title: The Best Christmas Pageant Ever
programme.desc: Nobody is ready for the mayhem that ensues when six of the worst youngsters disrupt the towns annual Christmas performance. Festive comedy based on the Barbara Robinson novel, starring Lauren Graham, Judy Greer and Pete Holmes

programme.title: Until Dawn
programme.desc: A year after their friend disappeared, a group find themselves trapped in a time loop, where they are hunted and killed unless they survive until dawn. Video game-inspired horror, starring Ella Rubin, Michael Cimino and Odessa Azion

programme.title: Mickey 17
programme.desc: In 2054, criminal Mickey Barnes signs up to be a worker who agrees to be reprinted every time he perishes. He flees Earth with friend and accomplice Timo on an interstellar mission to the remote colony of Niflheim, masterminded by Kenneth Marshall and his wife, Ylfa. The 17th iteration of Mickey is presumed dead after a close encounter with creatures on the planets surface, but is saved from a grim fate, and when he arrives back at base, Mickey meets his reprinted self. Director Bong Joon Hos sci-fi comedy, starring Robert Pattinson, Naomi Ackie, Mark Ruffalo, Toni Collette and Steven Yeun

programme.title: Thieves Highway
programme.desc: After discovering a plot to haul stolen cattle in the middle of nowhere, a desperate and isolated lawman becomes the only person standing between lethal rustlers and a clear run to the border. Thriller, starring Lochlyn Munro

programme.title: Three Wisest Men
programme.desc: Three siblings deal with personal changes and their mothers decision to sell the family home before Christmas. Between in-laws, wild animals, and a mall Santa, they try to make the holidays perfect. Drama, starring Paul Campbell, Tyler Hynes, Andrew Walker and Margaret Colin

programme.title: Tidings for the Season
programme.desc: A TV newscasters life changes when he meets his young superfan and the boys hardworking single mom. Romantic drama, starring BJ Britt

programme.title: The Friend
programme.desc: When a solitary writer adopts and bonds with a Great Dane that belonged to a late friend, she begins to come to terms with her past and her own creative inner life. Drama based on the novel by Sigrid Nunez, starring Naomi Watts and Bill Murray

Director Christopher Landons thriller, starring Meghann Fahy and Brandon Sklenar

programme.desc: Nobody is ready for the mayhem that ensues when six of the worst youngsters disrupt the towns annual Christmas performance. Festive comedy based on the Barbara Robinson novel, starring Lauren Graham, Judy Greer and Pete Holmes

programme.desc: When a solitary writer adopts and bonds with a Great Dane that belonged to a late friend, she begins to come to terms with her past and her own creative inner life. Drama based on the novel by Sigrid Nunez, starring Naomi Watts and Bill Murray

programme.title: Mickey 17
