The 17th iteration of Mickey is presumed dead after a close encounter with creatures on the planets surface, but is saved from a grim fate, and when he arrives back at base, Mickey meets his reprinted self. Director Bong Joon Hos sci-fi comedy, starring Robert Pattinson, Naomi Ackie, Mark Ruffalo, Toni Collette and Steven Yeun

programme.title: Drop
programme.desc: A widowed mothers first date in years takes a chilling turn when shes bombarded with anonymous threatening phone messages during their dinner, leaving her questioning if her charming suitor is behind the harassment. Director Christopher Landons thriller, starring Meghann Fahy and Brandon Sklenar

programme.title: Until Dawn
programme.desc: A year after their friend disappeared, a group find themselves trapped in a time loop, where they are hunted and killed unless they survive until dawn. Video game-inspired horror, starring Ella Rubin, Michael Cimino and Odessa Azion

programme.title: A Newport Christmas
programme.desc: A charitable and spirited Newport socialite in 1905 dreams of using her cash to start a foundation to help others in town. Romantic drama, starring Wes Brown and Ginna Claire Mason

programme.title: My Dead Friend Zoe
programme.desc: An Afghanistan veteran comes head to head with her Vietnam vet grandfather at the familys lake house. Comedy drama, starring Sonequa Martin-Green (The Walking Dead), Natalie Morales and Ed Harris

programme.title: Mad Max: Fury Road
programme.desc: A drifter in a post-apocalyptic wasteland encounters a crazed, sadistic warlord and his radiation-afflicted cult. He assists a warrior who has turned against the tyrant, and liberates five women who have been forced to become his brides. Together, they make a desperate journey through the desert to salvation, with their enemies in hot pursuit. Reboot of the sci-fi thriller franchise, starring Tom Hardy and Charlize Theron

programme.title: Passengers
programme.desc: A spacecraft transporting thousands of people to a distant planet malfunctions. As woken travelling companions Jim Preston and Aurora Lane fall in love, they are soon on a collision course with more technical problems and a dark secret. Sci-fi drama, starring Jennifer Lawrence, Chris Pratt and Michael Sheen

programme.title: Pitch Black
programme.desc: A spaceship crashes on a desolate alien planet inhabited by nocturnal predators. The creatures fear of light seems to guarantee the survivors safety - but when an eclipse takes place, they face a desperate struggle to survive. Their only hope lies with a convicted murderer, who is equally at home in the darkness - but is far from trustworthy. Sci-fi horror, starring Vin Diesel and Radha Mitchell

programme.title: The Chronicles of Riddick
programme.desc: Fugitive Riddick evades capture by bounty hunters and steals their spacecraft, only to run into an even bigger threat - fanatical cult members on a sinister mission to kill or convert anyone who crosses their path as they seek galactic domination. Sci-fi adventure sequel, with Vin Diesel reprising his role from Pitch Black alongside Judi Dench, Alexa Davalos and Thandwie Newton.

programme.title: Riddick
programme.desc: A fugitive is left for dead by his treacherous followers on a dangerous world full of lethal predators. He lures bounty hunters to the planet in the hope of killing them and stealing their spacecraft, but finds himself forced to work with them against an attack by the monsters at the top of the food chain. Sci-fi thriller sequel, starring Vin Diesel and Katee Sackhoff

programme.title: Mad Max: Fury Road
programme.desc: A drifter in a post-apocalyptic wasteland encounters a crazed, sadistic warlord and his radiation-afflicted cult. He assists a warrior who has turned against the tyrant, and liberates five women who have been forced to become his brides. Together, they make a desperate journey through the desert to salvation, with their enemies in hot pursuit. Reboot of the sci-fi thriller franchise, starring Tom Hardy and Charlize Theron

programme.title: Superman Returns
programme.desc: The Man of Steel returns to Earth after an absence of several years to find his lost love Lois Lane has moved on with her life. Meanwhile, arch-villain Lex Luthor is out of jail and about to wreak havoc on the world with technology stolen from Supermans home planet of Krypton. Comic-book adventure from X-Men director Bryan Singer, with Brandon Routh, Kevin Spacey, Kate Bosworth and Parker Posey

programme.title: Arcadian
programme.desc: A father and his two sons face off against terrifying creatures in a remote farmhouse. Director Benjamin Brewers dystopian horror thriller, starring Nicolas Cage, Jaeden Martell and Maxwell Jenkins

programme.title: Ghost Rider: Spirit of Vengeance
programme.desc: The demon biker roams Eastern Europe, looking for a way to rid himself of his supernatural alter ego. He is approached by a mysterious monk, who needs help protecting a boy from the horrific destiny the Devil has in store for him. Fantasy thriller sequel, starring Nicolas Cage, Idris Elba, Ciaran Hinds and Christopher Lambert

programme.title: The Invisible Man
programme.desc: An abused woman flees for her life and takes refuge with a family. It later appears that Cecilia Kasss ex has killed himself and shes due to inherit a fortune, but the fact he was experimenting with an invisibility suit makes her think hes come after her. Thriller, starring Elisabeth Moss, Oliver Jackson-Cohen and Harriet Dyer

programme.title: Godzilla
programme.desc: A conspiracy theorists investigation of his wifes death in a nuclear reactor meltdown leads him and his soldier son into an encounter with underground creatures, which go on a deadly rampage across the world. The only hope for the human race may lie with another equally destructive giant monster. Thriller remake, starring Aaron Taylor-Johnson, Bryan Cranston and Ken Watanabe

programme.title: The Lawnmower Man
programme.desc: A scientists ill-advised experiments with virtual reality equipment transform a mentally handicapped gardener into a computer-enhanced megalomaniac with the power to make his dreams of world domination come true. Sci-fi thriller, starring Pierce Brosnan, Jeff Fahey, Jenny Wright, Geoffrey Lewis and Austin OBrien

programme.title: Children of Men
programme.desc: In a future blighted by mass infertility, the human race is one generation from extinction and the world has plunged into chaos. In a totalitarian Britain, a jaded former activist tries to protect the first woman to become pregnant in nearly 20 years. However, a militant underground group plans to use her for its own ends. Thriller, starring Clive Owen, Michael Caine and Julianne Moore

programme.title: Man of Steel
programme.desc: With the imminent destruction of their home planet approaching, a man and his wife seek to preserve their race by sending their infant son to Earth. The childs spacecraft lands at the farm of Jonathan and Martha Kent, who name him Clark and raise him as their own son. Though his extraordinary abilities have led to the adult Clark living on the fringe of society, he is forced to take a stand to protect his adopted home from a fanatical general from his own world, who intends to wipe out the human race. Sci-fi adventure based on the Superman comic-books, starring Henry Cavill, Amy Adams, Michael Shannon and Russell Crowe

programme.title: Get Out
programme.desc: After African American photographer Chris and his white girlfriend Rose visit her wealthy parents, he suspects theres more to the locals than meets the eye. Oscar-winning psychological thriller written and directed by Jordan Peele (Us), starring Daniel Kaluuya, Allison Williams, Bradley Whitford and Caleb Landry Jones

programme.title: Passengers
programme.desc: A spacecraft transporting thousands of people to a distant planet malfunctions. As woken travelling companions Jim Preston and Aurora Lane fall in love, they are soon on a collision course with more technical problems and a dark secret. Sci-fi drama, starring Jennifer Lawrence, Chris Pratt and Michael Sheen

programme.title: Cloverfield
programme.desc: A gigantic monster of unknown origin rises from the sea and attacks New York. As the military throws everything they have at the creature to little effect, five survivors set off on a dangerous journey across the city to rescue a friend. One of the group documents their journey on a video camera, creating a first-hand record of the carnage. Found-footage thriller, starring Michael Stahl-David and Lizzy Caplan

programme.title: 10 Cloverfield Lane
programme.desc: A woman survives a car crash, and wakes up to find herself in an underground bunker, belonging to a survivalist who claims that a devastating attack has left the outside world uninhabitable. As his behaviour becomes increasingly stranger, she begins to fear she is being tricked and resolves to discover the truth for herself. Thriller, starring Mary Elizabeth Winstead and John Goodman

programme.title: Constantine
programme.desc: Exorcist John Constantine is cursed with the ability to see spirits stalking the Earth, and grudgingly takes on the forces of evil, hoping his actions will earn him a place in heaven. However, he is told he has terminal cancer and time for salvation is running out - unless a policewoman investigating her twin sisters death can find the key to saving his soul. Supernatural thriller, starring Keanu Reeves, Rachel Weisz and Tilda Swinton

programme.title: Gothika
programme.desc: A psychiatrist wakes to find herself confined in the mental hospital where she once worked, accused of her husbands murder. Just when she thinks her situation could not get any worse, the spirit of a dead teenager begins to haunt her. Psychological horror, starring Halle Berry, Robert Downey Jr, Penelope Cruz and Bernard Hill

programme.title: Superman Returns
programme.desc: The Man of Steel returns to Earth after an absence of several years to find his lost love Lois Lane has moved on with her life. Meanwhile, arch-villain Lex Luthor is out of jail and about to wreak havoc on the world with technology stolen from Supermans home planet of Krypton. Comic-book adventure from X-Men director Bryan Singer, with Brandon Routh, Kevin Spacey, Kate Bosworth and Parker Posey

programme.title: Pet Sematary
programme.desc: A father tries to resurrect his dead son by placing him in an enchanted burial ground but the plan backfires with devastating results. Horror, starring Dale Midkiff, Fred Gwynne and Denise Crosby, with a cameo appearance by author Stephen King, whose book provided the basis for the film

programme.title: Ghost Rider: Spirit of Vengeance
programme.desc: The demon biker roams Eastern Europe, looking for a way to rid himself of his supernatural alter ego. He is approached by a mysterious monk, who needs help protecting a boy from the horrific destiny the Devil has in store for him. Fantasy thriller sequel, starring Nicolas Cage, Idris Elba, Ciaran Hinds and Christopher Lambert

programme.title: Paradise Highway
programme.desc: Sally is a truck driver who is forced to smuggle illegal cargo to save her brother from a lethal prison gang. With FBI operatives on her trail, Sallys conscience is challenged when the last package turns out to be a teenage girl. Drama, starring Juliette Binoche, Frank Grillo and Hala Finley

programme.title: Mona Lisa and the Blood Moon
programme.desc: A girl with unusual powers escapes from a mental asylum and rejoins the chaos of modern-day civilisation, on the hedonistic streets of the French Quarter in New Orleans. Mystery thriller, directed by Ana Lily Amirpour and starring Ed Skrein, Kate Hudson, Craig Robinson and Jeon Jong-seo

programme.title: Clear and Present Danger
programme.desc: A CIA analyst gets caught up in the Colombian drug trade while trying to track down terrorists responsible for the murder of a close friend of the US president - but his investigations point to illegal activity and corruption at the very top of government. Action thriller, based on Tom Clancys novel, with Harrison Ford reprising his role from Patriot Games alongside Willem Dafoe, Anne Archer and James Earl Jones

programme.title: Sherlock Holmes
programme.desc: The eccentric detective and his confidant Dr Watson investigate the apparent resurrection of a criminal mastermind with links to the occult, who is carrying out a series of seemingly magical murders. The case is complicated by the reappearance of Holmes duplicitous old flame Irene Adler. Action thriller, starring Robert Downey Jr, Jude Law, Rachel McAdams, Mark Strong and Eddie Marsan

programme.title: Sherlock Holmes: A Game of Shadows
programme.desc: The detective investigates a series of seemingly unconnected crimes all around the world, and becomes convinced one man is behind them all - the elusive Professor Moriarty. He sets forth on an international journey to bring the evil mastermind to justice, but finds he is dealing with a foe who is his intellectual equal. Action thriller sequel, starring Robert Downey Jr, Jude Law, Noomi Rapace and Jared Harris

programme.title: Collateral
programme.desc: A Los Angeles taxi driver picks up a sharp-suited fare and is shocked when a dead body almost plunges through his windscreen during the first stop on the journey. The enigmatic passenger then reveals he is a hitman with four more contracts to carry out before the night is over, and forces the driver to help him. Michael Manns thriller, starring Tom Cruise and Jamie Foxx

programme.title: Jaws
programme.desc: A New England seaside towns tourist season is turned into a nightmare by a giant killer shark. The local police chiefs efforts to protect the public are thwarted by the greedy mayor, forcing him to join forces with a grizzled fisherman and an enthusiastic marine biologist to hunt and kill the monster predator. Steven Spielbergs thriller, starring Roy Scheider, Richard Dreyfuss and Robert Shaw

programme.title: Split
programme.desc: After being abducted by a kidnapper with multiple personalities, three young women are soon engaged in a fight for survival. Meanwhile, an oblivious psychiatrist tries to ease her patients fractured mind as a 24th character with apparent superhuman abilities attempts to dominate his body. M Night Shyamalans thriller, starring James McAvoy, Anya Taylor-Joy and Betty Buckley

programme.title: The Saint
programme.desc: International thief Simon Templar, a cunning master of disguise with a Swiss bank account almost full enough to retire on, accepts one last job - to steal a female scientists formula for cold fusion. However, he breaks his own golden rule by getting emotionally involved with the woman, leading to a deadly chase as the pair meet up in Russia and try to flee from the real bad guys. Action adventure, starring Val Kilmer, Elisabeth Shue and Henry Goodman

programme.title: Pulp Fiction
programme.desc: A series of interlinked stories about the Los Angeles underworld. A hitman plays minder to his bosss wife, and he and his partner deal with a dead body following a mishap with a gun. Meanwhile, a washed-up boxer goes on the run after refusing to throw a fight, and two lovers plot a hold-up in a diner. Quentin Tarantinos crime drama, starring John Travolta, Samuel L Jackson, Uma Thurman, Bruce Willis, Ving Rhames, Tim Roth and Amanda Plummer

programme.title: Unhinged
programme.desc: Following a minor road-rage incident, single mother Rachel is terrorised by a seemingly mentally ill stranger. She finds herself and everyone she loves the target of a man who feels invisible and is looking to make one last mark upon the world by teaching her a series of deadly lessons. Psychological thriller, starring Russell Crowe and Caren Pistorius

programme.title: Caddo Lake
programme.desc: The disappearance of an eight-year-old girl ties together a series of past deaths and disappearances, as well as bringing the truth about a broken familys history into the light. Thriller written and directed by Logan George and Celine Held, starring Dylan OBrien and Eliza Scanlen

programme.title: The Bikeriders
programme.desc: Truck driver Johnny is inspired to establish the Vandals motorcycle club in 1960s Chicago. He assembles a motley crew, including Brucie, Benny, Cal and Zipco. Exuberant outsider Kathy falls under Bennys spell, and they marry, but when the groom is the victim of a violent assault, Johnny exacts revenge, while Kathy fights for her husbands tormented soul. Drama, starring Tom Hardy, Jodie Comer and Austin Butler

programme.title: Jaws
programme.desc: A New England seaside towns tourist season is turned into a nightmare by a giant killer shark. The local police chiefs efforts to protect the public are thwarted by the greedy mayor, forcing him to join forces with a grizzled fisherman and an enthusiastic marine biologist to hunt and kill the monster predator. Steven Spielbergs thriller, starring Roy Scheider, Richard Dreyfuss and Robert Shaw

programme.title: Jaws 2
programme.desc: The seaside resort of Amity is terrorised once again by a man-eating great white shark. While police chief Brody struggles to alert the townsfolk to the magnitude of the danger, a group of teenagers - including Brodys two sons - is adrift at sea in waters hunted by the shark. Thriller sequel, starring Roy Scheider, Lorraine Gary and Murray Hamilton

programme.title: The Saint

programme.desc: Convict Rudy learns his cellmate has a girlfriend on the outside who he has only ever communicated with by letter. When the romantic inmate is killed in a riot and Rudy is paroled, he decides to track this woman down and assume the dead mans identity. However, his deception draws him into a casino robbery being orchestrated by her crazed brother. Thriller, starring Ben Affleck, Charlize Theron and Gary Sinise

In response, the gang comes up with another larcenous plan - but reckons without the interventions of a fellow thief and a sultry Interpol agent. Crime caper sequel, starring George Clooney, Brad Pitt, Julia Roberts, Catherine Zeta-Jones, Matt Damon, Andy Garcia and Don Cheadle

programme.desc: A father returns to Australia to buy his childhood home. To celebrate, he takes his teenage son to Luna Bay so they can surf together. However, he becomes locked in a battle of one-upmanship with local thugs. Thriller, starring Nicolas Cage and Julian McMahon

programme.title: River Hunters
programme.desc: River detectorist Beau Ouimette and presenter and keen swimmer Rick Edwards go in search of evidence of the clashing Scottish clans embroiled in the civil war that raged across the British Isles in the 17th century. Fights erupted during this period between the Royalists supporting the King and the Covenanters wanting more power for church and state. Starting on the River Lochy, situated in the shadow of Ben Nevis, the pair hunt for evidence of the 1645 Battle of Inverlochy - a pivotal fight that saw the Royalist army launch a surprise attack against the ill-prepared Covenanters

programme.title: Titanic: A Dead Reckoning
programme.desc: As the Titanic started to sink in April 1912, another ship came into view, offering her passengers the hope of being rescued. However, despite a fusillade of rockets, the ship turned away. Within two hours, 1,500 people were dead. An American investigation at the time accused the SS Californian, even though the freighter was stationary that night. A British inquiry concurred, keen to shift blame from national failures on lifeboat provision and steamship supervision. However, since Titanics wreck was discovered, the mystery began to unlock, and now, with recently discovered clues, a new suspect has emerged: the SS Mount Temple. This documentary follows a range of experts, using the latest investigative tools, as they examine these new clues and revisit the evidence from 1912 to take a fresh look at the cold case of the 20th century

programme.title: Kevin Costners The West

programme.desc: Brandon goes solo as an abandoned recording studio comes up for sale, while the heat is on when bidders clash over a trailer containing Civil War items

programme.title: Battle Treasures with Foxy and Bruce
programme.desc: Jason Fox and Bruce Crompton examine the stories behind some of the rarest and most remarkable military artefacts ever discovered

programme.title: Titanic: A Dead Reckoning
programme.desc: As the Titanic started to sink in April 1912, another ship came into view, offering her passengers the hope of being rescued. However, despite a fusillade of rockets, the ship turned away. Within two hours, 1,500 people were dead. An American investigation at the time accused the SS Californian, even though the freighter was stationary that night. A British inquiry concurred, keen to shift blame from national failures on lifeboat provision and steamship supervision. However, since Titanics wreck was discovered, the mystery began to unlock, and now, with recently discovered clues, a new suspect has emerged: the SS Mount Temple. This documentary follows a range of experts, using the latest investigative tools, as they examine these new clues and revisit the evidence from 1912 to take a fresh look at the cold case of the 20th century

programme.title: The Proof Is Out There
programme.sub-title: McMinnville UFO Photos, Paranormal Office and Australian River Beast
programme.desc: A look at the historic McMinnville photos, captured nearly 75 years ago, which as still considered to be credible and compelling proof of the existence of UFOs. Plus, signs of paranormal activity in an office and an elephant said to be speaking Korean

programme.title: What on Earth?

programme.title: Beyond Skinwalker Ranch

The siblings reunion is explored, along with their confrontation with the strange occurrences that have haunted them

programme.title: Britains Lost Battlefields with Rob Bell
programme.desc: The engineer examines the stories of six battles that shaped British history, beginning with Scotlands battle against the English at Bannockburn. With the help of historians, battle experts and re-enactors, Rob reveals the tactics and events leading up to Robert the Bruces famous victory against the English forces on June 24, 1314

programme.title: Secrets of Great British Castles
programme.desc: Dan Jones heads to the south-east of England to explore the turbulent history of Dover Castle. He reveals that Henry II ordered its construction not only as a statement of royal power, but also out of guilt for the murder of Thomas Becket, the Archbishop of Canterbury, in 1170. Dan discovers how a vast network of tunnels was used to defend the castle, including underground barracks built during the Napoleonic Wars and a nuclear bunker created during the Cold War

programme.title: Kevin Costners The West
programme.sub-title: The Robin Hood of El Dorado
programme.desc: How, in Gold Rush California, Mexican immigrant Joaquin Murrieta formed a gang of outlaws that spread terror across the newly formed state. His legend as a hero to the downtrodden endured despite being hunted down by the California Rangers

programme.title: Kevin Costners The West
programme.desc: How Kansas became a battleground in the US national debate over slavery. Settlers on both sides of the issue poured into the territory to determine its future as a free or slave state in its eventual admission to the Union

programme.title: Live Womens Big Bash League
programme.desc: Melbourne Stars v Sydney Sixers. Coverage of the T20 match at Drummoyne Oval in Sydney. The match in Melbourne last year was initially reduced to 18 overs because of inclement weather, and while the Stars scored 122/7 in the first innings, the Sixers saw their time at the crease reduced to 15 overs because of more rain, and their score of 104/1 was enough to win via the Duckworth-Lewis-Stern method

programme.desc: Leeds United v Chelsea (Kick-off 8.15pm). Coverage of the top-flight match at Elland Road. She also talks to Dathaí de Paor about Lady Catherine Power of Curraghmore House, while MacDara Ó Conaola tells her about well-known sculptor Albert Power. Guy teams up with a group of engineers from the same university to build a plane that Guy will ride like a bicycle - will he manage to fly into the record books?

With the help of bike experts Miles Kingsbury and Mike Burrows he builds a tandem, and pairs up with his friend, endurance expert Jason Miles, to see how far they can push their bodies. In the build-up to the final record attempt at the historic Goodwood Motor Circuit, Guy also learns about the science of cooking for athletes with nutritionist Nigel Mitchell, who instructs him to lose five kilos and recommends a new diet regimen

programme.title: Speed with Guy Martin
programme.desc: The motorcycle racer heads to Colorado where he hopes to win one of Americas oldest races - the Pikes Peak International Hill Climb. In this annual contest, known as the Race to the Clouds, riders compete against the clock on a gruelling mountainside track that finishes more than 13,000ft above sea level. To learn the skills required in hill-climb events, Guy visits the birthplace of the sport - Shelsley Walsh in Worcestershire. Racing up the course in an F1-style car, he realises sheer horsepower and driving precision are vital, but he must also take a high-altitude fitness test in a hypoxic chamber to prepare for the challenge ahead

programme.desc: Compo, Clegg and Foggy decide to invite long-lost school friends from the town for a drink at the pub on Christmas Eve. Festive instalment of the long-running comedy from 1981, starring Peter Sallis, Brian Wilde and Bill Owen

programme.title: Last of the Summer Wine
programme.desc: Compo, Clegg and Foggy head for the seaside to spend Christmas in a caravan, leaving Sid and Wally behind. Festive instalment of the long-running rural comedy from 1982, starring Peter Sallis, Bill Owen and Brian Wilde

programme.title: Only Fools and Horses
programme.desc: Del-Boy enters the import trade after striking a deal with Boycie to fetch a consignment of dodgy diamonds across from Holland, and ropes in Rodney and Uncle Albert to help. Their plans are jeopardised when old foe Chief Inspector Slater picks up the Trotters trail. Feature-length episode of the comedy, guest starring Jim Broadbent, with David Jason, Nicholas Lyndhurst and Buster Merryfield

programme.title: Keeping Up Appearances
programme.desc: Social climber Hyacinth finds herself all at sea when she makes an unexpected discovery during a QE2 cruise that threatens to jeopardise her dream trip. Christmas special from 1993, starring Patricia Routledge, Clive Swift and Geoffrey Hughes

programme.title: The Green Green Grass
programme.desc: Christmas edition of the Only Fools and Horses spin-off from 2007. Former Cheers actor George Wendt makes a guest appearance as a former GI who was billeted in the village during the 1970s, and has returned to find out whether he fathered any children during his stay. It does not take Marlene long to see what made him such a hit with the ladies, but Boycie proves harder to win over - until he discovers his unwanted guest is extremely wealthy. Sue Holderness and John Challis star

programme.title: Gavin and Stacey
programme.desc: On Christmas Eve, the Wests join the Shipmans for one of Micks famous turkey dinners. Smithy can hardly wait to spend his first yuletide with baby Neil, but fails to realise Dave will be tagging along and playing happy families with Nessa. Meanwhile, Gavin and Stacey make an announcement that does not exactly fill their friends and relatives with joy, and Bryn has a heart-to-heart with Jason. Festive edition of the comedy from 2008, starring Mathew Horne and Joanna Page

programme.title: Blackadder
programme.desc: It is Christmas Eve 1850, and the kindly Ebenezer Blackadder spends the festive season being taken advantage of by his relatives, his neighbours and even Queen Victoria. When he is visited by the Spirit of Christmas, he gains an insight into the dastardly deeds of his ancestors, and starts to wonder if he would be better off following in their footsteps. Comic reversal of the classic Dickens tale, starring Rowan Atkinson, Tony Robinson, Stephen Fry, Hugh Laurie, Robbie Coltrane and Miranda Richardson

programme.title: Not Going Out
programme.desc: Lee wants to spend time alone with Lucy at Christmas, but the unexpected arrival of Tim, Daisy and assorted relatives threatens his plans. The situation seems to be under control, until someone suggests playing a murder mystery game. Festive episode of the comedy from 2007, starring Lee Mack, Sally Bretton and Tim Vine

programme.title: The Royle Family
programme.desc: With the family stuffed full of turkey and Nana supping snowballs like theres no tomorrow, it can mean only one thing - Christmas at the Royles, who are celebrating in typical fashion by congregating round the TV. But this year they have special guests - the parents of Antonys posh girlfriend, Emma. Ricky Tomlinson, Sue Johnston, Caroline Aherne and Craig Cash star in the festive edition from 2000, with appearances by Sheridan Smith, Sharon Duce and John Henshaw

programme.title: The Royle Family
programme.desc: Denise decides to cook the Christmas dinner after being inspired by Nigella Lawson, and invites Daves parents, much to Jims dismay. programme.title: Still Open All Hours
programme.desc: David Jason stars in this follow-up to Roy Clarkes popular comedy Open All Hours. Once the dogsbody, Granville has inherited the business from his miserly uncle Albert Arkwright, but he is not alone in running the shop - he now has his own assistant in the shape of his son Leroy, who proves more popular with the ladies than his dad ever did. Its a typical day at the grocers as Granville tries to get a date with old flame Mavis without her terrifying sister Madge finding out, while Leroy shuns the old delivery bike in favour of an altogether more attractive way to take out the orders. James Baxter and Lynda Baron co-star, with appearances by Johnny Vegas, Mark Williams, Brigit Forsyth, Nina Wadia and Sally Lindsay

programme.desc: Ben Shephard hosts the quiz in which contestants answer questions to win turns on an arcade-style machine. The player who has won the least amount is then eliminated, and the last one standing competes for a £10,000 jackpot

programme.desc: Drew and Jonathans best friends from college bought a home with ample potential but painfully dated style, so the brothers swoop in to transform the main floor.

programme.title: Property Brothers: Forever Homes
programme.desc: Sandy and her son Colter inherited a house thats been in their family for generations, but the dated interior doesnt match their tastes or needs.

programme.title: DIY SOS
programme.desc: Nick Knowles travels to Orpington, south-east London, to meet hospital worker Jason Sulong, who was involved in a motorcycle accident that left him partially paralysed. Now he is unable to climb the stairs in his home and has difficulty accessing his bathroom and washing facilities, so designer Gabrielle Blackman teams up with the DIY SOS builders and other members of the local community to work to adapt his home to his needs over the course of just nine days

programme.title: DIY SOS
programme.desc: Nick Knowles travels to Basildon, Essex, to meet nine-year-old Brandon, who suffers a severe form of epilepsy and can have up to 30 seizures a day. He requires 24-hour care and mum Jenny cant let him out of her sight for a moment - and to make matters worse, the family home simply isnt safe enough for the youngster. Luckily, the local tradesmen have heard of the familys plight and arrive in force to help Nick and the team transform the home, with designer Naomi Cleaver on hand to ensure they dont stray too far from her vision

programme.title: Pete Wicks: For Dogs Sake
programme.desc: Pete helps a withdrawn pregnant Malinois regain strength so she can care for her 11 lively pups, and falls for Winter, a Staffie who is covered in scars

programme.title: One Born Every Minute
programme.desc: Childhood sweethearts Alyshea and Maculay worry about the welfare of their premature baby, who was born with lung problems and susceptible to infection and has been carefully monitored at Liverpool Womens Hospital. Samantha and Paul didnt have a chance to enjoy the birth of their first baby due to a complication during delivery, but their nerves are not helped by ending up in the same room on almost the same date. Meanwhile, Kevin and Emma are looking forward to becoming parents, after being forced to postpone their wedding and exotic travels plans

programme.title: One Born Every Minute
programme.desc: Rhiannon, who has cystic fibrosis, prepares to risk her life to have a third child, while an unexpected turn of events during labour means Kirsty and her partner, retired soldier Ian, must alter their birth plan. Plus, single mum SammiJo relies on her mum to help her bond with her second baby in a way she couldnt when her first child was born

programme.title: DIY SOS
programme.desc: Nick Knowles travels to Dartford to meet Scott and Jenny, whose third son Charlie was born with cerebral palsy and developmental delay. The boy needs round-the-clock care, which his mother gave up work to provide, but now he is 13, the family are struggling to cope in their small home. Having heard of their plight, the DIY SOS team turns up to transform their end terrace, backed up by an army of local tradespeople, with designer Naomi Cleaver on hand to ensure they dont stray too far from her vision

programme.title: DIY SOS
programme.desc: Nick Knowles and his crack team of builders, plasterers and electricians come to the aid of Frank and Christine Burrows in Wigan, Greater Manchester. In 2012, the Burrows 35-year-old son Mark retrained as a scaffolder to follow in his fathers footsteps, but was paralysed as the result of an unprovoked attack that left him with severe brain damage. Mark now needs constant care, but the Burrows family home is not yet fit for purpose, so Frank and Christine have been forced to take their son to a care home 15 miles away. With the help of flamboyant designer Laurence Llewelyn Bowen, Nicks experts set about constructing a self-contained apartment alongside the Burrows two-bedroom bungalow, which will provide Mark with the space, independence and security he will need to return home for good after spending two years away

programme.title: DIY SOS
programme.desc: Nick Knowles travels to Swansea to meet 15-year-old Jack, who suffers from a rare form of muscular dystrophy that has led to a lifetime of painful operations. His mother Helen and older brother Daniel do all they can to help but as he grows it has become impossible to get him upstairs and now he has to sleep in the living room, leaving the rest of the family with nowhere to socialise. Having heard of their plight, the DIY SOS team turns up to transform their three-bedroom semi, backed up by an army of local tradespeople, with designer Gabrielle Blackman on hand to ensure they dont stray too far from her vision

programme.title: MasterChef USA
programme.desc: Across a three-course menu, the finalists must ensure every plate is up to Michelin star standards for them to take home the title of Americas MasterChef

programme.title: NCIS: New Orleans
programme.desc: A case becomes personal for Pride when a murder victim is identified as Petty Officer Calvin Parks, who the agent used to mentor when the young man was in a gang. LaSalle question members of two rival gangs, but a drive-by shooting linked to the killing leads to an accusation from a mayoral candidate that the NCIS team has stirred up violence, and the investigators begin to question whether the death has a political connection. Crime drama, starring Scott Bakula and Lucas Black

programme.title: NCIS: New Orleans
programme.desc: A Navy lieutenant on shore leave stumbles from a busy bar and runs headlong into the path of an oncoming taxi, sustaining fatal injuries. Dr Loretta Wade quickly concludes that there is more to the case than meets the eye and eventually identifies the cause of death as bubonic plague, which brings Tony DiNozzo to town, having had a brush with the disease himself. He and Pride go aboard the dead mans ship to try to pinpoint the source of the disease and halt its spread. Crime drama, starring Scott Bakula

programme.title: Elementary
programme.desc: Holmes is conducting research in a hospital morgue when he stumbles upon a string of murders, crimes that went undetected by the staff as the victims were all weak or terminally ill. Tapping into his own vast knowledge of pathology, as well as Watsons medical knowledge, the sleuth deduces the people were killed by one of the medical staff - a so-called angel of mercy. Now all he has to do is find the culprit before more lives are claimed. Jonny Lee Miller and Lucy Liu star

programme.title: Inside the Ambulance
programme.desc: Jo and Ash deal with a patient whose chronic cough leaves him struggling to breathe, while Joel and Nic treat a man whos fallen from a ladder while wielding a hedge trimmer

programme.title: One Born Every Minute
programme.desc: Liverpool Womens Hospital opens its doors to 16-year-old Heidi, who is accompanied by her own mum Jo, and Adele, the mother of the babys father, who has decided to take her sons place in the delivery room. Dad-to-be Gavin hopes poetry will help his jittery wife Michelle get through giving birth to their second child, and 46-year-old Jane finds herself laughing through her daughter Louises contractions as a means of coping with the stress of being a birthing partner

programme.title: Tom Daley: Illegal to Be Me
programme.desc: The Olympic diving champion investigates homophobic behaviour around the Commonwealth, travelling to some of the countries where homosexuality is a crime and even punishable by death. Daley talks to sportspeople facing persecution and advocates fighting for change, including Michael Gunning of Jamaica, Indias Dutee Chand and swimmers Theresa Goh (of Singapore) and Amini Fonua (of Tonga)

programme.title: Hungry for It
programme.desc: The cooks level up the basic meal deal and create a menu entirely out of leftovers. But one cooks journey in the contest comes to a premature end

programme.title: Joanna Lumleys Japan
programme.desc: The actress flies over Tokyo in a helicopter. The city was bombed extensively during the Second World War, so almost all of it is a symbol of the post-war economic boom that saw Japan become the worlds second largest economy. While in the capital, Joanna heads out to a nightclub to see a Japanese girl band and witnesses the largely male audience perform almost as much as the artists on stage. Later, Joanna travels to the Kiso Valley to walk the Nakasendo Way, an ancient route that once linked Tokyo to Kyoto, a place best known for that most famous of Japanese traditions, the Geisha

programme.title: Joanna Lumleys Japan
programme.desc: The actress heads to the island of Shikoku hoping to gain a better understanding of Japanese Buddhism. She then takes a bullet train to another island - Kyushu - where she finds the Henn Na Hotel, the worlds first robot hotel. At Nagasaki, she visits Shiroyama Elementary school, one of the only buildings to survive the atomic bomb dropped on the city in 1945. Joanna then travels to Sakurajima, one of the countrys most active volcanoes, before heading to the islands of Okinawa where one of the bloodiest battles of the Second World War was fought

programme.title: Bangers and Cash
programme.desc: Derek inspects a brace of old cop cars including a Rover P6 complete with radio, sirens and V8 engine, and a former Mod waves ciao to his collection of 1960s Italian scooters

programme.title: Bangers and Cash
programme.desc: Derek swaps the office for rain-soaked Ripon to pick up a 1965 Ford Anglia with just 33,000 miles on the clock, while Daves loving the clean lines of a rare Renault Caravalle

programme.title: War Factories
programme.desc: How the Lancaster factory, one of the biggest buildings in Europe at the time, helped to create a truly war-winning weapon

programme.title: The World at War
programme.desc: How Japans early victories over Allied forces during the Second World War convinced its people that their strength and discipline would bring them victory. Narrated by Laurence Olivier

programme.title: Antiques Roadshow

programme.title: Joanna Lumleys Trans-Siberian Adventure
programme.desc: The actress embarks on her third travelogue, having previously traced the Nile from its source and sampled the varied rural, historical and urban cultures of Greece. This time, she sets out to travel 6,400 miles making use of the Trans-Siberian Railway, which is considered the longest railway line in the world. Joannas journey begins in Hong Kong, where she spent some of her childhood. She takes a bullet train to Beijing, where she meets a woman who claims to have known the last Chinese emperors favourite concubine, and officially joins the Trans-Siberian track. From there, she travels to the Great Wall, and takes an overnight train into Mongolia via the Gobi desert

programme.title: Joanna Lumleys Trans-Siberian Adventure
programme.desc: The actress reaches the midway point of her 6,000-mile journey from Hong Kong to Moscow via the Trans-Siberian Railway, taking in the varied sights of Mongolia. She spends time with native nomads, and visits a giant statue of Genghis Khan, as well as a gold mine. She also heads to the nations capital, Ulan Bator, where she tracks down the famous Mongolian throat-singers, before catching a train bound for Russia. However, making a start on the Siberian leg of her trek proves more difficult than Joanna expects when she experiences a spot of bother at the border

programme.title: Finders Keepers
programme.desc: Martin realises he isnt cut out for a life of crime and decides to legally declare the hoard to the local finds liaison officer Sam Barnes. The officer refuses to believe him, leaving Martin humiliated and once again considering his options. After an increasingly tense encounter with Rocky, Martin takes decisive action to sell off the treasure. However, when DS Doyle from the Greater London Art and Artifacts squad follows a lead to Rocky, the situation threatens to get out of control

programme.title: Heartbeat
programme.desc: Dr Merrick faces a testing time when a terrified hospital patient claims her husband is trying to kill her, but Merton seems reluctant to get involved, while Vernon picks up a bargain all-purpose pest-control solution, enlisting Davids help in his eradication mission. Ginas cousin Diane arrives to help her and Phil with the wedding preparations - much to the delight of PC Crane, who is instantly smitten. Rural drama, starring Aislin McGuckin, Tricia Penrose and Mark Jordon

programme.title: Good Witch
programme.desc: Cassie decides to plan a surprise party for Sam to celebrate the anniversary of his move to Middleton; Grace (with some urging from Abigail) decides to use her powers to create situations where she and Noah can get together

programme.title: Lewis
programme.desc: An American female bishop visiting St Gerards College is found dead after drinking poisoned wine, and when another two killings occur, both mirroring macabre murders from Jacobean revenge tragedy, it appears the culprit is targeting candidates in the election to become vice-regent. However, when Innocent learns one of the suspects is hiding a dark secret, Lewis and Hathaway realise the motive is much more twisted. Guest starring Sian Phillips and Ronald Pickup, with Kevin Whately and Laurence Fox

programme.title: Zoo Days
programme.desc: Senior keeper Darren Langford plays mother to a baby flamingo as the battle to save the flood-hit colony continues. Meanwhile, Asha the pregnant lionesss condition keeps the staff guessing. Documentary following the dramas of day-to-day life at Chester Zoo

programme.title: The Restaurant
programme.desc: Broadcaster, podcaster and social media star Doireann Garrihy takes her turn as the guest chef. From childhood memories to favourite dishes, Doireann is hoping that her menu can gain more stars than two previous head chefs - her sister Aoibheann and her radio colleague Donncha OCallaghan

programme.title: Worlds Greatest Hotels
programme.desc: A peek behind the scenes at the planets most iconic establishments

programme.title: Heartbeat
programme.desc: Chaos reigns after an unknown sniper shoots a woman as she leaves a meeting of the flower show committee. DS Rachel Dawsons enquiries reveal the gunman may have missed his intended target - and when Blaketon spots an article in the local paper, he realises the bullet might have been aimed at him. Meanwhile, Peggy buys an ice-cream van to take advantage of the hot weather, but makes the mistake of leaving David in charge of the project. Lindsey Coulson guests alongside Derek Fowlds and Clare Wille

programme.title: The Darling Buds of May
programme.sub-title: A Season of Heavenly Gifts - Part Two
programme.desc: Part two of two. Pops hoard of cash causes trouble for the family when Marcus Cope resolves to stop Charley buying the hop garden at any cost. Montgomery is unhappy at naval college and the Brigadiers solution provides a challenge for Pop

programme.title: Emmerdale
programme.desc: Ray reveals he knows what April has been up to, Marlon is filled with hope and Sam is shamefaced

programme.title: Coronation Street

programme.desc: Debbie takes centre stage to deliver a speech at a business event, Theo forces Todd to hide away in the flat, Dev questions Ashas future plans, and Roy catches Shona rifling through his mail

programme.title: The Royal
programme.desc: After finding out about the hospitals staffing problems, Jill offers to cut short her maternity leave and return to work, while Matron notices that Catherine is doing her best to avoid Adam. Out in Africa, Jeff faces the horrors of war and makes a promise to a dying woman - but faces difficulties in keeping his word

programme.title: Agatha Christies Poirot
programme.desc: Schoolgirl Jennifer Sutcliffe becomes embroiled in a mystery when priceless jewels are hidden among her belongings. The precious stones once belonged to a prince who fell foul of a revolution, and now his cousin is a pupil at the same school as Jennifer, where Poirot finds himself drawn into the unlikely situation and realises nothing is quite what it seems. David Suchet stars as the Belgian sleuth, with Harriet Walter and Claire Skinner

programme.title: Heartbeat
programme.desc: The Aidensfield policemen are called to subdue anti-war protestors at a disused airfield, but the event has serious repercussions for Walker after he accidentally hits one of the mob with his truncheon. Younger is gutted to discover Rosie has feelings for new vet Fergus, who is the indirect cause of chaos when a cobra escapes from his car at the garage. Irritated that nobodys taking her snake-catching suggestions seriously, Peggy refuses to help with the hunt and drives off with David - straight into the arms of danger. With Jonathan Kerrigan, Gwen Taylor, Vanessa Hehir and Andrew Langtree

programme.title: Vera
programme.desc: The detective investigates the mysterious death of businessman John Shearwood, found floating in the water under the Gateshead Millennium Bridge when he was supposed to be on a golfing trip to Ireland. The mans wife Stella and brother Luke are baffled to discover he was working as an informant for HM Revenue and Customs. Chief Revenue investigator Owen Preece (guest star Robert Glenister) reveals Johns business manager Mark Donovan has been running an alcohol scam through their haulage firm and the deceased had agreed to offer information in exchange for immunity from prosecution. Was his cover blown? Owen doesnt think so, and Mark has an alibi - unlike Johns wife. Brenda Blethyn stars, with David Leon as her trusty sidekick Joe

programme.title: Emmerdale
programme.desc: Ray and Celia discuss their plans, Dylan is horrified and Paddy admits how much he misses his dad

programme.title: Rig 45
programme.desc: When Trevor and Emma establish that they cant find Emma, they ask the Benthos staff for help, though they are uncooperative. Susanne wants to continue the repairs, but with Petra at large, fear spreads on board. The rest of the staff are reluctant to go search for a killer, especially in a place where she knows her way around and has killed before. Drama, starring Andrei Alen and Lisa Henni

programme.title: Trigger Point
programme.desc: Alex contacts the police with critical information about a new attack planned for that day, but Commander Francis warns the team against placing too much trust in him - when the attack does come, its shocking in its ingenuity and deadly intent. When Alex calls again with more intelligence, the team must split resources to work out if an unscrupulous financier could be targeted next.

programme.title: Heartbeat
programme.desc: Steve is forced to cover for Phil when the father-to-be discovers Gina has gone into labour two months early and rushes to the hospital to help with the nerve-racking delivery. Meanwhile, Merton is excited when it appears a drug dealer could soon be brought to justice. Drama, starring Mark Jordon, Tricia Penrose and Duncan Bell

programme.title: Good Witch
programme.sub-title: Not Getting Married Today - Part One
programme.desc: Part one of two. Cassie discovers a 10-year-old girl - Pavla - playing in the bushes at Grey House. She is hiding from her adoptive parents, Eddie and Marla, who could use a little help from Cassie and Abigail as they forge their new family. Meanwhile, Martha announces that her son Michael is getting married. He and his fiancee Vanessa want a simple wedding, and Martha needs some gentle reminders from Cassie to not go overboard

programme.title: Lewis
programme.desc: Hathaway and Lewis struggle to determine whether a death during a college-based clinical trial for a new antidepressant was murder or suicide, and receive little assistance from the institutions evasive psychiatric professor. A second students demise then leads to the revelation that the trials participants are all operating under the influence of a mind-altering drug, and that the lines between love, obsession and madness have become dangerously blurred. Guest starring Douglas Henshall (Primeval), Lucy Liemann (Rev) and Thomas Brodie Sangster (Love Actually)

programme.title: Zoo Days
programme.desc: The endangered red pandas have two cubs, which receive their first medical check-ups

programme.desc: Just over halfway through the seven-year renovation project the team adopts unusual measures to make way for the next stage of the audacious build - a four-storey roof extension. However, Poirot is soon on the scent of troubled heiress Norma Restarick, who had problems of her own - not least confessing to the possibility she has killed someone herself. Guest starring Jemima Rooper, Zoe Wanamaker and Peter Bowles, with David Suchet as the Belgian sleuth

programme.title: Heartbeat
programme.desc: Paul Nicholas guest stars as a Swedish sailor who waits for his ship home in Bernies funeral parlour - but may not be telling the truth about the contents of the coffin hes escorting. Rosie and Fergus struggle to get their fledgling relationship off the ground as a series of interruptions plague their dates, while Bellamy starts to wonder whether trying again with Gina is really such a good idea. programme.desc: The bomber reveals how he came to plant the explosives on the Greenpeace ship Rainbow Warrior, and the measures he took to escape New Zealand after the attack.
